Reza
597 produits enregistrés
0
128 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
4 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
12
Recommandé
1.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 26 juin 2022
Short Answer:
A well-designed parody of Jonathan Blow's The Witness, and a surprisingly good standalone puzzle game. Clever gameplay any puzzle fan can enjoy, though the comedy might fly over your head if you've never played the game it references. Lots of fun, completely free, and well worth a playthrough if you've got an hour or two to kill.

NOTE: Currently contains a puzzle that's inaccessible to the deaf or hard of hearing.

UPDATE (2022-09-20): Subtitles have now been added to provide accessibility to the deaf and hard of hearing, but note that they currently cut off at the bottom if you're playing on an ultrawide monitor.

Long Answer:
In 2016, Jonathan Blow released The Witness, a game in which you solve many, many grid-based line puzzles in an open world format with zero instructions on how to solve them, instead teaching the player simply through its puzzles and some trial and error. It was met with largely positive reviews for its atmosphere and puzzle design; but there were many players--myself included--who found it frustrating due to how easy it was to learn the wrong lessons when working out its cryptic puzzles, not to mention the air of pretentiousness it can give off with its attempts to be philosophical. Regardless of which side of the coin you may land on--if you land on it at all--it's a game that most players either love or hate.

The Looker is a parody of The Witness, poking fun at it in a way that I'm convinced only someone who loves it could have accomplished. Everything from its environment to its puzzle layout and even its Steam page is set up to replicate The Witness, albeit with its own comedic twist. The core gameplay involves using your mouse to draw lines from "Start" to "End" on a series of mazes, most often presented on panels but occasionally hidden throughout the environment. The puzzles range from mind-numbingly simple to surprisingly clever, and there's more variety than I expected given the simplicity of its core puzzle mechanic. At least one joke is made towards every popular quirk or criticism to be found in The Witness, but they never come off as mean-spirited, nor do they overstay their welcome. Most importantly, the comedy never gets in the way of the fun, despite the many cheap shots they could have taken at the cost of player experience, such as adding pointless filler or impossibly obtuse puzzles (though one at the end does have a sharp difficulty spike). You may not get as much out of its jokes if you've never played The Witness, but at least the gameplay will be entertaining either way.

Comedy is hard to get right, parody even more so, but it managed to do a decent job of it without sacrificing on what makes a fun game. The Looker is not just a parody of a puzzle game, it's a legitimately good puzzle game in its own right. Even if you've never played The Witness, you can still find something to enjoy here, and that to me is the hallmark of a good parody. Whether you loved, hated, or have yet to play its source material, this is still an easy recommendation if you're looking for a new and creative puzzle game to play. Besides, it's free and only takes about an hour or two to play, so there's no reason not to at least give it a try.

UPDATE (2022-09-20): When I originally published this review all the way back in June, I mentioned a need for certain quality-of-life features, namely the ability to change camera sensitivity and adding subtitles for in-game dialogue (since one puzzle relies on sound cues to be solved). As of an update launched a few days ago, these and many other player concerns have been addressed: both camera sensitivity and Field of View can now be changed; and English subtitles have been added, though right now they seem to cut off at the bottom if you're using an ultrawide monitor like me. If you were on the fence about this game due to the issues I mentioned back then, now is a great time to finally give it a chance.

For more game reviews, check out my Curator page!
 
Michael

54 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile

Recommandé
5.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 8 octobre 2022
I don't think I've ever before played a game that's a straight up parody of another game. But the cool thing about The Looker is it's not just comedy, but also fun to play!

The Witness is both very smart and very smug, so it's basically begging to be spoofed. The Looker does just that. Have you ever considered that "thinking outside the box" also means you can just literally ignore the maze and connect the start and end points from the outside?

Some jokes in the game made ma laugh out loud (and I'm sorry to sound pretentious, but the Gravity Rainbow was among them, if only for how unexpected it was). Others didn't exactly land, but the game in general was short enough not to dwell on them. And the final puzzle had me in stitches.

But the cool thing is, The Looker kind of does require lateral thinking. The puzzles are not mindless nor completely primitive, you actually do have to be perceptive, try unexpected things, and think outside the box to solve them. Turning mazes into a shooter was particularly interesting (honestly, I can imagine an actual game with this mechanic). I had fun.

All in all, it's a good king of parody -- cheeky but also its own thing. Could this game be appreciated by someone who hasn't played The Witness? Probably not, but at least you're playing a relatively fun short game and not watching a gag reel.
 
alphyna

4 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante

Recommandé
1.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 17 aout 2022
A fantastic parody of another brilliant game, The Looker is a lighthearted satirical take on the often perceived pretentious nature of ‘intellectual games’ and ‘games as art’. Entirely free to play, approximately 1 to 2 hours are needed to fully complete the game.

It is a minimalist game focusing on drawing a red line from ‘start’ to ‘end’ in a series of maze style puzzles which mimic the structure of the 2016 game ‘The Witness’. The beginning is a series of deceptively easy panels to interact with that slowly progress with more difficult and unexpected environmental puzzles that take ‘think outside the box’ literally.

There is no hand-holding through the puzzles but at the same time there’s only one puzzle that stood out to be exceedingly tougher than others. Provided the puzzles aren’t brute forced, it doesn’t fall into the trap where the puzzles simply don’t make sense even after you solve them.

There is one section where player speed and dexterity will play a role. As far as I can tell, it won’t prevent you from progressing the game - only lock you out from being able to gain an achievement should you be unable to meet the requirements. You can replay this section infinitely and the rest of the game can be done entirely at your own pace.

Those who have played ‘The Witness’ previously, love it or hate it, will almost certainly get a laugh out of ‘The Looker’, meanwhile it still remains accessible and enjoyable for those who are not as familiar with said game.
 
Ghostie

Évaluation publiée le 25 avril 2023
I've played games that poke fun at videogame tropes a la The Stanley Parable and Undertale before but I don't think I've ever seen a game that is just a straight-up parody of one particular title, so I can say that I was very surprised when the game was not only hilarious but actually very enjoyable in its own right. Anyone who knows me well enough knows that I consider The Witness to be a true masterpiece, so it should be understood that for me to recommend a game mocking my favorite game, I have to really admire it.

Cool Naoto
5
40 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
3 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
1.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 17 juin 2022
搞笑版《见证者》，直接GOTY好吧（大雾）。

本作是对《见证者》的一个“Parody”（戏仿），在各个方面都和《见证者》极度相似，包括画风和玩法，但基本上所有的东西都被“搞笑化”了。幽默来源于解构，可以说本作就是对《见证者》中的一些设计进行了解构，既让整款游戏充满了《见证者》的既视感，又把一些设计故意替换成了更差、更奇怪的设计，完全颠覆玩家的期待，起到搞笑的效果。

比如核心玩法，比起《见证者》中有模有样的面板和方方正正的网格，本作中的解谜区域基本上就是只有笔刷工具的Windows画板，一上来就充满了“劣质感”。像《见证者》一样散布在各处的音频记录也十分随便，乍一听像是讨论了什么物理学、哲学、历史之类的东西，但仔细一听就知道完全是在胡扯和故弄玄虚，不知道《见证者》里面的音频记录给一些玩家带来的是不是就是这种感觉，我反正......不敢说，毕竟我不懂。除了这些之外，本作甚至还融合进了一些不属于解谜游戏范畴的要素，这些完全不应该属于这种游戏的展开恰恰就是本作幽默感的表现。

《见证者》里非常吃受众的一点，就是其对“猜规则”的要求，这也分为逻辑谜题中的“猜符号”，和一些环境谜题。本作中也分别对这两种方式进行了调侃。在“逻辑”的部分，一些“规则”可能说起来并不复杂，但玩家猜起来就很容易多想，尤其在没有足够的试错空间的时候，属实是考读作者的心了，我反正没猜出来是什么意思，只知道和顺序有关。而一些“环境”谜题所需要的脑洞，往好了说是脑洞，“Outside the box”，往不好了说，确实十分离谱，给人一种在玩多年前盛行的一些“坑爹”游戏的感觉。《见证者》正是因为这样，挫败了一些玩家的情绪，至少我就看到过一个差评说的是这个。

不过，即使本作的主要目的是搞笑，它里面的一些解谜要素还是可以的。要解开这些谜题，玩家同样需要跳出常规框架进行思考，思考规则的本质到底是什么，总之肯定不只是从“Start”到“End”那么简单。它还真的学到并且应用了《见证者》里面的一点精髓，即使它在其它方面把《见证者》调侃得连底裤都不剩下。这个游戏的结局（制作人员名单之前）尤其体现了本作的这种夹杂在正经解谜和搞笑之间的“两面性”，一方面，它确实体现了《见证者》中最令人惊诧的那种设计，另一方面，等我回过神来，终于理解到这个最终的笑话的“笑点”有多么简单粗暴的时候，那种感觉真的是，太难以言说了。可以说到这里，我才真的绷不住，大声笑了出来。

总而言之，无论你喜欢《见证者》，还是讨厌《见证者》，只要你玩过《见证者》，我觉得都能从本作的“内部笑话”中得到许多的乐趣。我认为这款游戏的存在并不是为了抹黑《见证者》，也不是为了诋毁Jonathan Blow，即使制作人员名单放了张他的照片（我其实没看清楚，但看上去像），并且配名Johnny Suck，嗯......不管了。《见证者》不是一款完美的游戏，本作则也没有“做得更好”一说，只是既用极端化的方法，让我们更清楚地看到《见证者》中的一些值得探讨的问题，又通过对一些设计的优秀沿用，让我们发现《见证者》中真正的闪光点。

好了，不说了，我也不想在一个搞笑游戏的评测里做那么多“阅读理解”，免得我自己成为卖弄学问的笑柄。推荐就完事了。
 
OldCaptainWZJ
418 produits enregistrés
1

Évaluation publiée le 15 mai 2023
A comedic take and parody on the controversial game 'The Witness.'
Very funny, as well as just being a good puzzle game. That's all I'll say.

If you liked The Witness, you'll like The Looker.
If you hated The Witness, you'll LOVE The Looker.

2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
1.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 18 aout 2022
The Witness только с юмором
Внимание! Все сказанное в этом обзоре, является не более чем мнение обозревателя и не претендует на звание истины в последней инстанции.
Пункты:
Сюжет - Начинаем в тоннеле как оригинале, и тут с этого момента начинается веселый стёб над The Witness начиная от аудиозаписей озвученные в пьяной манере и одна из них прерывается на рекламу пива, до головоломок некоторые из которые очень забавны, как например одна вроде был не выполняемая но на деле надо чертить на проводе между мониторами, или еще одна где нужно иcчеркать всю табличку для открытия двери.
До вплоть до концовки которая стёбно обыгрывает сразу две концовки (Одну основную, другую секретную с видеорядом из IRL) и с дальнейшем вылетом на рабочий стол (Как в оригинале, ха).
The Looker 
Une capture d'écran de The Looker
Par : NatanBlock🐾

Геймплей - Так как пародия на Witness, то и геймплей тут точно такой же, только головоломки иные. Головоломки очень простенькие но забавные как ранее сказано и представляют игру "Начерти линию в лабиринте", но при этом можно даже не решать головоломки, а просто смело похулиганить на доске нарисовав половой орган, свастон или еще что-то другое забавы ради. Да и игра короткая и пробегается буквально за час, если не меньше.
The Looker 
Une capture d'écran de The Looker
Par : NatanBlock🐾

Графика - Графически и визуально все на максимум приближено к эстетике The Witness, ибо как никак пародия, и технически игра работает очень стабильно и не было не одной ошибки или бага. Локации тут все две (Замок и лабиринт) которые довольно небольшие, но при этом хорошо проработаны и напичканы всякими приколами, при том что игра линейная.
Ахах XXXD 
Une capture d'écran de The Looker
Par : NatanBlock🐾

Вердикт:
Неплохая, а главное забавная пародия на The Witness которая высмеивает оригинал и её слабые стороны, к тому же еще бесплатная и коротенькая. Рекомендую к скачке, особенно тем кто уже играл в The Witness.
Оценка 8 из 10

P.S
Вступайте в группу и подписывайтесь на куратора NB Pictures и следите за обзорами первыми.
https://store.steampowered.com/curator/33555256/

Recommandé
2.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 21 juin 2022
恶搞Jonathan Blow的解谜名作The Witness。

段子很实在，就是人们玩见证者时的实在脑洞实在感受。开场隧道，草一笔画，狗屁录音，风景还行，电线，LASER！甚至还有隐藏结局的“嗨呀我摔倒了”。真踏马不留情面调侃了个痛快，不由得心疼吹哥这个老比。

整个小品的逻辑与见证者一致，即对既有世界的不断发现，只是控制了内容规模。小院子粗看四通八达，其实是一本道，不需要跳过某个环节去别处找开关，也不能跳过某个环节不然没法推进。谜题够有趣，不在于难度而关乎角度，于是轻松加愉快。

但我觉得最妙的还得是，即便我这样剧透，等到亲自玩的时候你还是会因为不知道、也无法预料作者要整什么活而感到刺激与兴奋。能有这份全然享受太难得：开局，这什么几把？玩懂了，但这要是不画个几把还算个人？打靶挑战，我画个几把！结局，我画个几把——好么，你blow来我suck，横竖都cock，没毛病，让大火贱笑了。

更多评测 ＠80days
 
Edwin

Évaluation publiée le 16 septembre 2022
The devs behind this game understands what Jonathan Blow's "The Witness" is about and all of its strengths, weaknesses, and oddities. They know there is a lot of discussion to be had about the game and many things to parody. The Looker is primed and ready to say a whoooole lot about The Witness from the very beginning...

and the developers instead spend the whole game screwing with you.

10/10
 
Dragonova
0
29 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
1
Recommandé
1.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 2 novembre 2022
The Looker is a first-person puzzle game designed to parody The Witness, another puzzle game with very similar visuals and gameplay. This, however, goes for a more amusing approach, and instead of having to connect systems together, you must draw a line from the "start" point to the "end" point.

This seemingly mundane concept is conceived rather creatively, with plenty of situations that require you to think outside of the box. Other times the game will completely change itself, and these scenarios range from turning into a first-person shooter, to transforming into a Snake arcade game, to drawing shapes in a precise way until a distant voice says he is satisfied.

I think the extremely high review score this game has speaks for itself. Yes it's a parody, but it doesn't sacrifice itself to that title. It is still an exceptional title that is both fun and hilarious to play. It is one of the best free to play games I have ever played, and I couldn't recommend it highly enough.

If you would like to see a slightly more detailed version of this review, as well as reviews for other free to play indie games, be sure to check out my video for them here:

Vidéo YouTube™: Reviewing Free to Play Indie Games (The Looker, Hex Rally Racers, + More) [Episode #2] 
Vues : 143
Since the first episode received some positive feedback, I've decided to make a second one, containing six more free to play indie games.

Recommandé
1.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 13 aout 2023
First up, it's a parody of the hyper-pretentious-ish-yet-great game The Witness. If you loved TW, you'll love this. If you hated it, you'll also love this. The comedy is there, and it's honestly done just so well. It doesn't have a tenth of the gameplay time as TW, which is entirely in it's favour, and it's more than willing to go all out in taking the piss. As an avid piss taker, this game pleases me greatly. Give it the time it deserves, and you won't be disappointed.
If you haven't played The Witness, you'll probably like it anyway. Doesn't matter though. It's free!

Recommandé
0.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 juin 2023
This is quite possibly the best parody game of all time. But just like all good parodies, it requires you to be familiar with the source material before playing to get the FULL effect. TL;DR, only play this after you've played a bit of The Witness.

This is the funniest game I've played. Humor works on the element of surprise, and jesus, will you be surprised. The game gives off this aura of taking itself super seriously - just like The Witness - and then proceeds to never take itself seriously. It does a fantastic job at poking fun at all elements of The Witness, even the sudden difficulty spike!
 
Ohana Matsumae

Évaluation publiée le 19 juin 2022
An excellent fan game of "The Witness" that both manages to keep the inginuity of outside-the-box puzzles while also being a spoof. Replicating both the feel and aesthetic of the original game as well as making fun of it's more enigmatic parts. Takes about 1-2 hours to complete in it's entirety and works as a nice homage for those that enjoyed "The Witness".

如果你喜欢见证者，你应该玩观看者。
如果你讨厌见证者，你就更应该玩观看者了。
不过话说回来，这两波人不是一回事吗，回想一下玩见证者的经历，当前期在半岛被扭转了方向的谜题版折腾的死去活来，当中期在树屋一次次的穷举试错来探寻意✴义✴不✴明的八角星规则时，当在大后期被现实谜题折磨的死去活来时，除了顿悟的感受和对真理的追求以外，肯定想情到深处往死里黑这个游戏。啊，什么，你说要对谜题保持敬畏，啊对对对，自我实现需求的顿悟也是令人上瘾的，“这不是斯德哥尔摩综合症的一种表现吗？”——Jonathan Blow，我敬畏的是游戏结构本身，但游戏结构背后总会有无处不在尾随你欣赏着你卡关、抓脑袋和顿悟的吹哥啊！所以说游戏的尽头就是核心粉丝和制作组集体转黑，只要我们作者和狂热粉先把游戏骂完了，别人再骂就只是拾人牙慧，天下武功唯当先不破，这才是最高等的境界。
咳咳说回正题，观看者的谜题和netameme质量还是挺高的，致敬的地方也相当多，比如菜单界面的捂眼睛、故作玄虚的录音带，以及和见证者极度相似的美术风格（说这是DLC我都信）。见证者玩多了可能会比一般通过玩家（啊什么，这游戏会有一般通过玩家？）更晚顿悟不用绕着框划线（瞧瞧你玩见证者都顿悟了些什么.jpg），而且解密思路也是一脉相承，谜题质量也在线，不是无脑过的恶搞向，开局城堡的谜题就需要动脑子了，从这个角度来说可能比见证者还难吗，毕竟见证者的城堡主线谜题还可以无脑过（笑）。
而且离开城堡后会发现这游戏的体量还真正儿八经是那么回事，还能玩上差不多俩小时，作为免费游戏不能要求更多了。本游戏作为见证者的精神外传就不说太多了，毕竟见证者是哪怕看攻略都极度破坏游戏体验的，这个一脉相承的恶搞衍生作自然也是如此，喜欢见证者的玩家看到这里就够了，去寻找假面舞会的兔子珠宝吧，虽然是恶作剧的山寨珠宝，但起码作者也是一遍遍的拿着蜡烛走过水池了的。
最后，诠释即过度诠释，理解即误解，我在这叨叨了一通也不过是瞎扯淡，观看者的致敬恶搞也是扯淡，吹哥就是个做游戏的他懂个屁的见证者他的访谈也全是扯淡，但这“扯淡”终归是敬畏，这座岛一样有值得探索的秘密。
 
BlickWinkel
164 produits enregistrés

I'm sure you already know that this is a parody of The Witness, but it's a great parody and a real puzzle game underneath all that. Sure, some of the solutions break what you've been shown, but it just means you need to think a bit more laterally.
If you've played The Witness, this one should be more of the same but with some silly jokes to go along with it. Recommended!

Gardian20
172 produits enregistrés
0
21 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
3
Recommandé
17.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 30 septembre 2023
The Looker: A Hilarious and Ingenious Parody of The Witness

You know how video game parodies can often be hit or miss, right? Well, 'The Looker' is a delightful exception that's both funny and free! It lovingly pokes fun at 'The Witness,' dropping you onto a quirky island for more mind-bending line-drawing puzzles and comical audio tapes.

Starting simple, the puzzles gradually evolve from kid's menu maze-level to mind-boggling conundrums. Some even demand you to view the world from fresh angles. I had a blast solving most of them (except one, which I stubbornly cracked through trial and error because I didn't pay attention earlier).

Here's a heads-up: there's a sound-based puzzle in there, but you can probably brute-force your way through if you're not feeling particularly puzzle-savvy that day.

Now, let's talk humor. 'The Looker' is a riot, but I won't spoil the jokes for you. Trust me, part of the charm is discovering them yourself. It takes 'The Witness' and gleefully messes with your expectations, often delivering delightful surprises and hilarious audio logs that riff on everything from 'Gravity's Rainbow' to philosophy and poetry. I actually laughed out loud, which is a rare feat for video game parodies.

Oh, and the best part? 'The Looker' is completely free on Steam, crafted by the genius Bradley Lovell, aka Subcreation Studio. If you're into the tech side of things, Lovell's got you covered on his website.

Speaking of 'The Witness,' we loved it, even if it had a bit of philosophical grandiosity. It made our favorites list in 2016.

And hey, just recalling one of 'The Looker's' puzzle jokes had me laughing again. Kudos, 'The Looker'—you've got humor and puzzles down to the a way that even a himbo like me can enjoy them!
 
Kenstagator

Дуже ХРІНОВА гра. Але це прекрасно) Ви зрозумієте про що я 😅
Головоломки прекрасні, прості і зовсім не нагадують The Witness, під час якого в мене стався відвал сраки. В цій грі все було весело, чудово і відвал сраки стався лише від сміху. Гарно вистібали Вітнес)) і не лише.
Дуже рекомендую цю гру усім, хто немає грошей, бо вона безкоштовна.

pad0n
442 produits enregistrés
0
26 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
1.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 17 juin 2022
As someone who lost himself for a week or so in The Witness a couple of years ago and would name it as one of his favorite games of all time I was hesitant while awaiting the release. For every Airplane! there's tens, if not hundreds, of Meet the Spartans or Epic Movies. Bad spoofs/parodies are a dime a dozen, luckily this isn't one. Sure, not every joke lands, but most do... which is a better ratio than most late night hosts would get in their dreams. Could it be more polished, have better voice acting, be longer? Sure. But for what looks like a one man show this is pretty damn nice. So nice actually that'd I would've gladly parted with some money for the 60-90 or so minutes of content.

My only gripes were with SNéK... I needed multiple tries to get past it because the end point spawned in already filled out parts of the screen. Either find a way to make sure that doesn't happen or maybe shorten is by 2 or 3 "levels" so it's not as likely to happen. Also loosing focus on the typing drawing of the dead segment needed me to play it thrice to get the necessary score for the achievement. Annoying, but not nearly as much as the SNéK thing just moments before.

Anyway... it's free, it's short, and it's fun. Highly recommended if you've played The Witness, not sure how much sense it would make if you haven't, and have the necessary humor. On the other hand, if you think The Witness belongs in a museum and everyone should give it the necessary respect because it's art, this might trigger you.

*Unnecessary Edit for a badge - please ignore. ;)

I played The Witness for 61 hours (apparently) and I really enjoyed it despite it having it's head waaaaay up it's own ass.

The Looker sweeping the legs out from under The Witness and then peeing all over it's face while it lays writhing on the ground is exactly what The Witness deserves, if not more. The boat puzzle and the 60 minute long movie puzzle in The Witness were both crimes against humanity... and The Looker is divine retribution from the gods.

Also: Game funny
 
AtypicalChuck
0
26 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
3.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 27 juin 2022
What a fun (and clever) game! After getting a headache from mind bending puzzlers and stressing out in action adventures, The Looker was just perfect. It is a brief parody of The Witness (which is in my list of all-time favorites). To be honest, it has been so many years since I played The WItness, that there is a lot I don't remember. No worries... The Looker is still fun.

You arrive on an island with gardens, a castle, and a maze. Puzzles consist of using your mouse to connect Start and End points (that come in a host of flavors and variations). Solutions are not hard but 'coloring in the lines' with a mouse took some practice. Achievements are easy and fun, with the exception of an arcade game that requires a minimum score. I gave up on that, for now, as any score will allow you to progress. There is not a lot of instructions and you just figure it out along the way, which is a big part of the experience.

I recommend it to those looking for a fun few hours, at a great price. Put on those headphones and take time to listen to the commentary along the way... at a minimum, it will make you smile.
 
CindyK_JA

Space Stepmom
0
27 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
10 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
5
Recommandé
2.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 2 juillet 2022
The Looker - The Hooker - The Cooker - The Pooper

Головоломки - это сложный жанр. В него не все могут играть, ведь для получения подобного удовольствия нужен мозг, а он то, конечно, есть у всех, да вот беда - пользоваться им далеко не каждый умеет.

Но вот полосочки!

Полосочки проводить может кто угодно, даже совсем наголову отбитый подписчик Ольги Бузовой. Полосочки чертить это отдельный вид удовольствия, который может приносить радость как детям и взрослым, так и инопланетянам и разумным деревьям. Как можно не любить полоски? Особенно тогда, когда их можно чертить.

В The Looker можно чертить полоски. Хорош ли The Looker? Устроим научный эксперимент с моим коллегой - Борисом. Борис любит чертить полоски, еще он ищет счастье, так что он будет отличным ассистентом.

===[Полоски]===
✅ Нельзя чертить
✅ Нельзя чертить
✅ Нельзя чертить
✅ Нельзя чертить
🔲 Можно чертить

Борис появился в каком-то странном туннеле. Пройдя по нему дальше, он увидел нечто… то, что и вовсе не ожидал увидеть.

Вся жизнь Бориса перевернулась с ног на ноги - пред ним предстал невероятный ужас, заставивший его сердце биться нисколько быстрее обычного, его глаза резко сузились, ведь на них упал яркий свет, а тело покрылось мурашками, ведь подул ветер.

Борис нашел доску.

На этой доске были две надписи - Start и End. “Что это! Почему тут все на пиндосском, cука?” - С глубоким разочарованием проговорил Борис. Но тут он понял истину - полоска! Он достал свой дорогой сердцу маркер, который подарила ему бабушка, когда ходила в магазин, после чего начал рисовать на доске полоску.

И полоска его была столь же необычна, как и тот факт, что вы все еще читаете этот текст. Она извивалась кругом, потом еще одним, совершала невероятные повороты и вверх, и вниз, словно лучик Солнца скачущий по стене вашей спальни. Крутыми виражами и толикой матов Борис закончил работать над полоской - дверь, на которой и была доска, отворилась, и Борис вошел дальше в небольшое помещение, оставив за собой белую дощечку с нарисованным на ней громадным мужским половым органом.

Но вот незадача - пред Борисом встала другая доска, другая злобная прямоугольная штука, так и вызывающая первородную ярость у нашего героя. Он ударил ее головой и упал, отряхнулся и поднялся вновь. “Мужчина, бл*ть, никогда не сдается!” - гордо сказал рыцарь в сияющих спальных шортах и вновь ударил доску головой.

Ничего не вышло.

После он достал из заднего несуществующего кармана своих шорт красный маркер, тот самый маркер, который подарила ему мама, когда ходила на ярмарку.

Борис вновь принялся разрисовывать доску, он рисовал и вверх, и вниз, и вправо, и еще раз вниз… но ни разу влево, ведь это было совсем не по-мужски, со слов Бориса. К сожалению, именно в левой стороне находилась надпись Start, из-за чего Борис не мог решить эту загадку 2 недели, 4 дня, 18 часов, 37 минут и 15 секунд. На 16-тую же секунду Борис произнес героическую фразу, цитирую:

“АаааАаААаАаБЛяЯяЯяЯТЬАааААаааААСуКаААааА!”

После чего начал чертить полосы безразборно по всей доске, что и открыло проход дальше. Спустя 4 дня, 18 часов, 37 минут и 16 секунд - Борис победил. Ведь настоящий мужчина никогда не сдается.

Так наш герой вышел во двор, огромный и просторный холл с кучей деревьев, фонтанами, величественными каменными стенами и лестницами, будто принадлежащие самому Каркасону. Он решил умыться в фонтане стоящем недалеко, но не смог. Его остановила незримая глазу стена, из-за чего пришлось всем вокруг продолжать вкушать новые запахи Бориса, которые он приобрел за последние время. Это и стало ответом на загадку о пустоте холла, ведь нигде не было ни животинки, ни птички, ни даже жучка. Все вымерло, и все из-за Бориса.

“Как это из-за меня? Да тут, cука, невидимая стена! Тупорылый cукa долба*б срaный на*уй, разработчик этот х*ев урод cукa! Бл*дина он е*аная, бл*ть, да чтоб он cука сдох на*уй, у*бок патлатый, петушaра cукa хyeвая, злоeбуча…” - и еще ровно 264 слова состоящие в речи Бориса, на которые у нас не хватило максимального количества слов в обзоре. Приносим свои извинения за подобный казус, я уверен, вы со всем почтением прочитали и насладились бы всеми оставшимися 264 словами сказанными нашим дорогим героем.

После речи Бориса он направился дальше по тропинке от фонтана, прямо к следующей дощечке. Достав свой красный маркер, тот самый маркер, который он украл в детстве из хозяйственного магазина, когда ему было всего 24 года, он начертил линию в одном месте, потом в другом, сделал полоску кривую, прямую, угловую, и даже в форме мужского чле

Но так и не сумел найти главное - счастье. Возможно ему поможет мистер Хинт? Это был улыбчивый мужчина стоящий в том же холле. Но радостный товарищ нашему герою кроме лести и любезностей ничего сказать не смог, после чего получил горстку минокислот, мочевин, а также моносахарид и продукты их превращения - пировиноградная, лимонная и уксусная кислоты прямо в свое говорящие бесполестности лицо.

Но свершилось чудо - совсем недалеко стоял брат мистера Хинта - Ржавый Хинт, пожилой металлический мужчина с тяжелым прошлым. Он прожил долгую жизнь полную приключений и мучений, это напомнило Борису и его еврейское прошлое, они быстро нашли с Хинтом общий язык.

“Да, мой друг, раньше моя металлическая башка варила прямо как котелок моей подружки Посуда-Мойры, с офигенной задней панелью настройки, хе-хе. Но сейчас мои пропитые очистителем микро, от слова микросхема, мозги совсем не те что раньше. Электрические сигареты без зарядки перестали дарить кайф, виски протекающий из моего дырявого бочка не стал нагревать сервоприводы, а истории моих приключений пересталось придумывать так ловко. Жизнь не та пошла что раньше, Боря… не та.”

Борис, пуская скупую слезу за тяжелую судьбу своего оловянного товарища присел к нему, прижался ближе и затянулся разряженным куском металла. Несмотря на все беды, на бессмысленность черчения полосок - Борис обрел счастье, ведь отыскал родную свою душу.

Так и вышло. Старый бродяга по кличке Ржавый Хинт, родом из города Жру-Йод, штат Алломама, и старый писатель-литератор Борис Неругается, из славного города Хабарпринеск, штат… нету там штатов никаких, сидели и выпивали очиститель ржавчины производства компании « JustRust ». Сидели вместе, одинокие, но истинно счастливые.

Нет, это еще, к сожалению, не все

Выливая из уха остатки очистителя чистоты, а также не забывая прочертить полоску на своем рабочем столе в реальной жизни, следует сказать пару фактов об игре, да пусть не пугает вас это страшное слово.

Игра совершенно бесплатная и является очевидной аллюзией на головоломку “The Witness”, которая, по-моему мнению, совершенно не удалась. У меня даже есть обзор на нее, где я возмущаюсь полосками. Но тут я не возмущался, наоборот - я наслаждался, прямо как Борис попивая очиститель ржавчины. Игра наполнена первоклассным юмором, в прямом смысле этого слова - перво классным. А также имеет пару-тройку хороших головоломок и внезапных геймплейных элементов, которые делают эти 2 часа игры увлекательными и приятными, оставляя прекрасное послевкусие и легкую головную боль, в основном от количества начерченных в игре мужских половых органов.

И не только по вашему желанию.

Я клянусь вам своей жизнью - хотите/не хотите, а пиcюн при прохождении игры вы нарисуете хотя бы раз.

Утюг:

The Looker - Это прекрасный пример первоклассного стеба, уже не в том значении, что до этого. Игра отлично указывает на ошибки и слабые стороны объекта стеба, а также подкидывает внезапные и очень приятные элементы в геймплей, кои хотя бы чуть-чуть не оставят вас равнодушными к ним. Я бы с радостью поиграл в крупную игру в подобном жанре, но, к несчастью, у нас есть только The Witness, а в нем ведь, к превеликому сожалению, совсем нету огромных, красных, прямо на всю карту здоровенных ху

И помните: “Игру помогал делать сам Johnny Suсk, известнейший в Великобритании ученый-проктолог”

Спасибо за Черчение! Ты потрясающий!
 
Samus Stone

16 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1
Recommandé
4.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 8 octobre 2022
Игра является пародией на одну из моих любимейших игр The Witness. Причём пародий умной, она настолько ловко выпячивает серьёзность и некоторую претенциозность The Witness, что у меня нет никаких сомнений в том, что автор игры изучил творение Джонатана Блоу больше, чем любой другой его фанат (а скорее всего он и сам является его самым преданным фанатом). Некоторые пазлы разрывают шаблоны жанра, чего от откровенно пародийной игры совсем не ожидаешь. Юмор тут также замечательный, я, честно, два или три раза громко рассмеялся, что редко бывает, когда играешь в видеоигры один. И при этом игра совершенно бесплатная!
Если вы фанат The Witness или может быть наоборот яростный хейтер (хотя я не верю в существование хейтеров у этого шедевра), даже не думайте проходить мимо, бегом играть! Если же The Witness для вас пустой звук, то и смысла проходить The Looker нет.
Итог: 10/10, шедевр от START до END.
 
Khan
722 produits enregistrés

Recommandé
1.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 30 aout 2022
I loved this and I feel anyone who played the witness should play through this as blind as possible

The thing that's so great about this is it pokes fun at everything I hated about the witness which I kinda expected but delivered better then I expected.

What's surprising that for a free game the puzzles are genuinely clever and varied and the line drawing mechanic works very well. there are 2-3 genuine head scratchier puzzles but nothing I got stuck on and you know generally what you should be solving even if your a bit stuck.

I left this game laughing and happy were the witness just made me roll my eyes at the end.

Recommandé
1.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 31 décembre 2022
The Looker

총점 (Overall score) : ★★☆(2.7)
Review date : 2023.01.01
Genre : Puzzle
Metacritic Score : - (Profile Features Limited)
Playtime(Story / 100% / Review) : 1h / 1h / 1.3h

시놉시스 (Synopsis)
Start와 End를 연결하는 퍼즐을 풀어 낯선 섬을 탐험하자
Let's explore strangely island by solving puzzles connecting start to end

한줄평 (One line review)
예상 못한 엔딩과 엔딩영상 후 마무리까지
Unexpected ending and ending after ending video

개별점수 (Score)
연출
Direction
★★★
엔딩을 위한 재미난 설계
Interesting design for the ending
음악
Sound
★★
기억에 남지는 않음
Don't remember
스토리
Story
★★
스토리가 필요한 게임은 아니라서
It's not a game that needs a story
집중성
Concentration
★★★★
흥미로움
Intersting
그래픽
Graphic
★★☆
적당함
Not bad

장점과 단점 (Pros and ♥♥♥♥)
🔵S와 E 연결에 대한 다양한 방법 (Many ways to connect S and E)
🔵재미난 소재와 적절한 분량 (Interesting material and appropriate amount)
🔵예상할 수 없고 유쾌한 엔딩 (Unpredictable and delightful ending)

❌목적의 부재 (lack of purpose)

특징
- 심플한 무료 퍼즐게임

코멘트 (Comment)
[S와 E 사이]
인생은 Birth와 Death 사이 Choice.. 라는 철학자의 말이 있었는데,
이 게임은 사이에 뭐가 있지는 않지만 S (Start)와 E (End)를 연결해야 진행이 가능하다.
그것만 하면 되는데 간단한 퍼즐부터 S와 E를 찾기도 어려운 퍼즐, 뭐 어쩌라는 건가 라는 퍼즐 등 여러가지가 있다.

무료게임인 만큼 분량은 크지 않아서 1시간 정도면 클리어 가능하다.

중간에 공포게임... 처럼 느낄만한 부분이 있는데 게임 자체가 패러디 게임이라 그런지 그냥 넘어가면 끝이다.

3D멀미가 있으신분은 시야각이랑 회전속도가 빠르니 조심하세요.

[결론]
유쾌한 엔딩을 가지고 있다. 엔딩을 위한 게임이라고 생각해도 되겠다.


기타 참고사항 (Other notes)

- 한글화 (Korea localization)
⬜️ 완벽 (perfect)
⬜️ 한글화가 되어있고 플레이에 지장이 없음 (localized and no difficulty to play)
⬜️ 한글화가 되어있지만 플레이에 지장이 있음 (localized but difficulty to play)
⬜️ 유저 한글화라 추가로 조치 필요 (user localiztion)
⬜️ 특정 사이트에서 구매해야 한글화 (only specific website purchases)
☑️ 비한글화지만 플레이에 지장이 없음 (not localized, but no ploblem to play)
⬜️ 비한글화이며 플레이에 지장이 있음 (not localized)

- 가격 (Price)
☑️ 할인 없이 사도됨 (recommended)
⬜️ 50% 할인이면 살만함 (if 50% off)
⬜️ 70% 이상 할인하면 살만함 (if 70% off)
⬜️ 돈주고 사기는 아까움 (not recommended)

- 사양 (Specification)
⬜️ I7, 16 GB RAM, RTX 2070
☑️ I5, 16 GB RAM, GTX 1060
⬜️ I3, 8 GB RAM
⬜️ 웹서핑 가능한 정도 (IE available)

- 난이도 (Difficulty)
⬜️ 저세상 난이도 (afterlife difficulty)
⬜️ 골치 아픔 (hard)
⬜️ 연습 필요 (need to exercise)
☑️ 쉬움 (easy)
⬜️ 클릭만 하면 됨 (just click)

- 플레이타임 (Play time)
⬜️ 500시간 이상 (over 500 hours)
⬜️ 200시간 이상 (over 200 hours)
⬜️ 50시간 이상 (over 50 hours)
⬜️ 10시간 이상 (over 10 hours)
☑️ 10시간 이하 (under 10 hours)

- 버그 (Bugs)
☑️ 완벽 (perfect)
⬜️ 플레이에 지장 없는 사소한 버그 (minor bugs)
⬜️ 클리어는 가능하지만 짜증나는 버그 (clear is possible, but annoying bugs)
⬜️ 심각한 버그 (critical bugs)

Évaluation publiée le 21 novembre 2023
Produit reçu gratuitement

fantastic satire take on walking sim puzzle games, seriously if you love that genre you should play this because it not only makes fun of that type of game it simultaneously feels like a love letter to them, there were some genuinely good puzzles in here
 
fifthhorseman
561 produits enregistrés
0
36 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
11 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
1.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 5 juillet 2022
The store page description states:
"You wake up, alone, on a strangely familiar island full of puzzles that will frustrate and annoy you."

And... That's the gist of the game. It's a lot of maze puzzles that are either laughably easy or so incredibly vague, think-outside-of-the-box, cryptic bull that you'll either look up a walkthrough (like I did on several occasions) and then go "that's so stupid," or just quit the game then and there.

There is no options menu, so don't go expecting you can change even basic options, like mouse sensitivity (it was too low for me), screen resolution, and so and so forth. Also, for the sake of clarity, EVERYTHING is a maze puzzle, including the menu for continuing or exiting the game. Connect everything from START to END, that's about all you need to know about the mechanics of the game.

It probably takes like an hour or so to clear the game, it took me an hour and a half because I got stuck several times and had to look up a walkthrough. So an hour's worth of game... All of that is a lead-up to a punchline that was so unfunny and so not worth it to the point where it actually looped around to being funny and actually kinda worth it. That's pretty amazing in and of itself.

Do I recommend it? Well, it's free, so wouldn't hurt to give it a shot. Just be prepared to go "really?" or "oh come on!" a whole lot, and keep a walkthrough handy just in case. But like I said, I think the ending is kinda worth it, although don't expect it to be a life-changing revelation, and don't expect any form of catharsis from it.
 
Humblebee
1,704 produits enregistrés
3
15 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
6 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
1.8 h en tout

게임 전체가 단 하나의 엔딩만을 위해 만들어진 무료 퍼즐 갓겜

위트니스를 즐겨했다면 눈물을 흘리며 이 게임을 플레이할 것입니다
 
haramey

0.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 16 juin 2023
Enter a world where art and intellect intertwine, where creativity and brilliance converge in a mesmerizing tapestry of puzzles and themes. Embark on an extraordinary adventure through a garden of enigmas, where every step reveals a stroke of genius lurking beneath the surface. This intricately crafted experience, designed to challenge and captivate, is nothing short of a masterpiece.

From the moment one sets foot into this artistic wonderland, a sense of anticipation fills the air. The garden, meticulously designed with a delicate balance of beauty and complexity, beckons the curious soul. Each puzzle, a hidden gem waiting to be discovered, tests both the nimble fingers and the agile mind. The layers of mystery slowly unfurl, revealing hidden meanings and metaphors that awaken dormant neurons and ignite the imagination.

The first puzzle, an intricate sculpture woven from steel and glass, demands attention. Its intricate patterns and shifting perspectives mirror the multifaceted nature of the human experience. As the journey progresses, one encounters a breathtaking mural composed of vibrant hues and abstract symbols. The observer is challenged to decipher the underlying message, connecting the dots between the artist's intent and the enigmatic riddles embedded within.

The true genius of this artistic expedition lies not only in the puzzles themselves but also in the overarching themes woven throughout. As you traverse this garden of wonders, you encounter nods to history, philosophy, and scientific discoveries. Each puzzle becomes a testament to the creator's profound understanding of the world, leaving you in awe of the depth and breadth of human knowledge.

Évaluation publiée le 26 juin 2022
Exceptional parody of the game ‘The Witness’.

Great parody, great humor, great puzzles.

I got stuck once, where an additional visual, in-world indication of where to continue/begin the next part would have helped (instead of running around looking at multiple places repeatedly); and I can exactly point to what and how it could have been.
Otherwise, no complaints or reservations at all.

Playthrough 1h.

At no cost, if you played The Witness, this is a must-play!

Recommandé
2.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 21 juin 2022
"The Looker" is a free, really good parody of puzzle games (and, I guess specifically, "The Witness"). I don't know why it's free since it's about 2.1 hours long and is better than many non-free games (my normal $/hr metric would put its fair value at a bit over $2). The only Achievement I didn't get is "On Rails" (Score 600 or higher on a certain challenge) since the required speed and accuracy of mouse drawing is too much for my abilities (the only such place in the game). Still, overall, a really good game and highly recommended.
 
DALCOhstangultion
319 produits enregistrés
0
61 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
93 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
24
Recommandé
1.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 18 juin 2022
To be fair, you have to have a very high IQ to understand The Looker. The Puzzles are extremely subtle, and without a solid grasp of Quantum Mechanical Theory, most of the solutions will go over a typical player's head. There's also the out of box thinking, which is deftly woven into his the many puzzles this game contains. This game draws a lot of inspiration from the lesser game known as The Witness while at the same time massively improving on the formula. The fans understand this stuff; they have the intellectual capacity to truly appreciate the depths of these puzzles, to realise that they're not just smart- they also say something deep about LIFE. As a consequence people who dislike The Looker truly ARE idiots- of course they wouldn't appreciate, for instance, the Narrators existential catchphrase "The Obelisk of Knowledge! Oooooooh the Obelisk of Knowledge!" which itself is a cryptic reference to the Solanum Melongena. I'm smirking right now just imagining one of those addlepated simpletons scratching their heads in confusion as Subcreation Studio's genius wit unfolds itself on their computer screens. What fools.. how I pity them. 😂

And yes, by the way, i DO have an Obelisk of Knowledge in my pants. And no, you cannot see it. It's for the ladies' eyes only- and even then they have to demonstrate that they're within 5 IQ points of my own (preferably lower) beforehand. Nothin personnel kid 😎
 
Violet❤

Interested to see what other games come from Subcreation Studio!


Side note for 1 of the achievements.

On Rails: Score 600 in a certain challenge:
I used painter's tape to tape my left mouse down and got it the first try after many fails due to clicking outside the box and losing the precious seconds to refocus and continue the mini mazes.
 
Dahl
6
19 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
1
Recommandé
1.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 17 juin 2022
Once a generation, we get a video game that truly and wholly can be considered art, in the sense that it can go in a museum and we can hire personnel to guard it from spontaneous cake attacks. In The Looker, simple maze puzzles are expanded until they fill up your entire monitor, while an intelligent sounding person reads to you words that were probably written in a book first.

Anticipate 1-2 hours of easy to moderate puzzles with dozens of genuinely funny moments sprinkled in between. You'll get the most out of the experience if you've played the (genuinely good and genuinely pretentious) video game The Witness, but don't let inexperience prevent you from playing this. If you enjoy this game, be sure to play the game it is satirizing.

Unlike The Witness, this experience is pretty linear and you may get stuck on a puzzle and not be able to proceed, although this is a normal issue for any puzzle game. There are sometimes issues with the game not accepting answers because your line has tiny breaks; this can make one or two of the late game puzzles a little more frustrating than they need to be. Just retrace your lines with a steady hand and you too can complete and enjoy this brilliantly crafted satirical romp. Otherwise, everything about this game is really well done and manages to capture the joy of the game it is mocking at the same time it pokes fun.
 
TheGreatSirNiko

Recommandé
2.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 26 juin 2022
Produit reçu gratuitement

Esse jogo é ridiculamente divertido !

Se você está procurando algo para jogar casualmente, recomendo fortemente este jogo.

O jogo pode ser curto, dependendo da forma que jogar, pode chegar a durar por volta de uma hora e meia.
Mas garanto pra ti, que o tempo que você passar no jogo será extremamente recompensador.

Além de ser gratuito, o jogo possui ideias inovadoras e dão um ar fresco, para um gênero que já foi muito explorado. Ainda devo citar como bônus, que é possível fazer todas as conquistas do jogo em uma jogada só, portanto seja curioso e se desafie ao máximo que será recompensado por isto.

E digo mais, eu te desafio a tentar achar alguma analise negativa do jogo no Steam.

Boa sorte, Bom jogo e Divirta-se.

Selo: Tião Approves de qualidade!

神ゲーでした。
witnessをリスペクトした作品で、一筆書きでパズルを解くゲーム。
witnessみたいな難しいパズル！というよりは発想の転換とかひたすら試行錯誤するのが大事なので、

witnessへのリスペクト愛をかなり感じたので、このゲームをやった人はwitnessもぜひやってみてほしい。

ギャグとスリル満載、ぜひ最後のオチまでやってほしい。
1,2時間とかで終わる

237 produits enregistrés
0
16 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1
Recommandé
1.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 12 juillet 2022
The Looker is an unique puzzle game. You get a red pencil to draw on the screen in order to solve puzzles. Your position matters to solve certain puzzles. And it will require some creative thinking.
The game description already tells you the puzzle will frustrate and annoy you, however that is only true for one minigame. The "On Rails" game. It like a shooter, but if you misclick one of the canvases you return to move-mode and any movement of the mouse causes the screen to move out of the minigame.
Other than that one minigame the game is very entertaining and funny.
A great game from start to end.
 
Druton
1,885 produits enregistrés
0
11 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 6 décembre 2023
I thought this was a joy. I don't think I've played a parody of a computer game before. I was aware of PYST but thought it sounded dumb, and I knew of the Boggit and Bored of the Rings, but I'd never played the games they were parodying for more than three minutes, so I never looked at them either. I can't even name any other video game parodies, but what a perfect game to send up.

I will say I really liked the Witnesses' puzzles and out of the box thinking, and gorgeous environments, and also I thought some of the philosophical stuff was fun to explore, but I was really hard on it for its lack of story and almost offensive ending. Especially when compared to Talos Principle which did the philosophy and story much better. I think probably the maker of this game feels similar to the way I do. What a fun send up, and it actually plays like a competent game too. The author really understands, too, that brevity is the soul of wit, something that humorous video games tend to have trouble with when they stretch out their jokes for 40 hours.
 
archcorenth
835 produits enregistrés
0

Évaluation publiée le 23 juin 2022
终于又来了，在各种对见证者致敬和暗示后，对见证者的解构。
无论如何都推荐在见证者之后游玩，因为论这个游戏本身就是破Click（见证者本体当然要logic的多），如果你直接玩就连额外的这一点乐趣都没得到了。
这肯定是真爱粉，就像zappa的We're Only In It For The Money对披头士的嘲讽，实际上是加深了披头士佩珀的经典地位。
（这里就是举个例，我并不很喜欢披头士）

zzFuzzy
0
9 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.6 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 24 juillet 2022
이 작품은 조너선 블로의 위트니스의 패러디작입니다. 그래서인지 왠지 미스트의 패러디작이었던 Pyst와 같은 포지션의 게임처럼 느껴졌어요. 다만 Pyst나 여느 패러디 작품들처럼 과하거나 지저분하진 않습니다. 마지막 화장실 개그 빼곤 대부분은 귀엽거나 넌센스 장난들로 가득해요. 위트니스 외에 타 게임 패러디와 타 비디오게임 레퍼런스도 간혹 있습니다. 너무나도 실없고 느닷없어 빵터지는 순간도 있어요. 단순한 게임성 대비 지나치게 사색적인 스토리를 가졌던 위트니스의 일면을 풍자하는 것이 전반인 작품이지만, 그렇다고 거기에 매진하거나 불쾌하게 까진 않습니다. 사용자들이 공감했을 부분 딱 그 부분을 애교가득 담아 장난치는 수준이에요.

패러디 작이니 난이도가 낮거나 너무 실없지 않을까 싶은데... 네, 맞습니다. 퍼즐 전반은 미로찾기나 선 그으면 끝나는 것들로 가득해요. 허나, 중간중간에 외우기 퍼즐이나, 조금 비틀어 생각을 해야 하거나, 넌센스라서 상자 밖 사고를 해서 풀어야 하는 퍼즐들도 있습니다. 동시에 위트니스에서는 보기 어려웠던 파괴적인 액션(!)도 있으며, 선 긋기로 아케이드 슈팅 게임을 재현한 구간도 있습니다.

선이 굵지 않고, 빠르게 긋다보면 끊기며, 벽에 펜이 닿으면 아주 찰나의 시간 동안 잉크가 안 나오고, 긋기 공간을 벗어난 곳을 클릭하면 선긋기 모드가 해제되는 등의 불편점들이 선긋기의 손맛을 저해하는 문제가 있습니다. 하지만 어떻게 선을 긋던, 몇번을 그어 선을 긋던 '이어져 있기만 한다면' 선으로 이해하기 때문에, 그런 편의성에 의해 불편점이 크게 느껴지지 않습니다. 다만 아케이드 슈팅 파트는 다소 어려울 수 있겠습니다.

한편으로 분위기는 위트니스와 비슷하기 때문에 (동시에 거의 완벽한 재현) 위트니스 하면서 졸으셨다면 이 게임을 하다가도 졸 수 있습니다. 저도 하다가 졸아버려서 1시간 가량 꿀잠잤네요. 그리고 영어나 개그코드가 안 맞는다면 즐거움의 반은 잃을 수 있습니다. 개그 자체가 은은하게 가다가 장난삼아 한방을 날리는 식의 개그라, 강하게 때리는 개그들을 좋아하신다면 (화장실 개그나 피터지는 개그같이 맹렬하고 자극적인) 실망하실 겁니다. 다만 반면에, 그런 강한 개그들이 불편하시다면 이 게임의 소소한 개그들이 맞을 수도 있단 말이기도.

무료게임 답지 않게 볼륨이 있습니다. 빠르면 1시간 내, 길면 저처럼 2~3시간에 깰 텐데요. 짧지만 그 사이에 경험할 지점들이나 몇몇 개 장난들을 숨겨놔서 그거 찾거나 경험하다보면 매우 알찬 시간이었음을 깨닫게 됩니다. 심지어 크레딧 올라간 이후 마지막에 쿠키영상(?)있습니다. 의외로 다양한 시도를 하는 작품이며 다양한 것을 보여줍니다.

옹골차고 뭉툭하고 실한 작품입니다. 심지어 가격보시다시피, 이 작품은 무료로 해줍니다!

+ 중간에 호러스팟있습니다. 호러에 민감하시면 주의하세요.

+ 커뮤니티, 스크린샷 보는 것도 재미 중 하나. 정답 판정이 널널하기 때문에 그를 이용해 장난을 쳐놨거나, 어떤 퍼즐은 단숨에 이해하기 어려워서 근성으로 발악(?)하듯 선을 그어 퍼즐을 푼 유저들도 있습니다. 그렇게 남의 결과물들을 또 보는 것도 참맛.
 
Kyterog
0
10 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 9 janvier 2023
Haha, geiles Spiel!

Dieses Spiel verarscht absichtlich die schweren Puzzlespiele dieses Genres.
Einige Rätsel sind so einfach, dass es fast schon weg tut.
Und dann steht man plötzlich vor einem ähnlich aussehendem Puzzle und kapiert gar nichts mehr.
Da muss man dann manchmal um die Ecke denken oder mal den Kopf schief halten und mit einer anderen Sicht an die Sache rangehen.
Und dann ist das plötzlich doch wieder richtig einfach. ^^

Als ich das Spiel gestartet habe, habe ich erst gar nicht kapiert, wie ich da weiterkomme, oder was ich da genau machen soll.
Dann merkte ich, man muss einfach irgendwie immer ein Start oder S zu eine Ende oder E hinziehen.
Mit einem Rotstift, den man per Klick aktivieren kann, womit man dann im Bild herummalen kann.
Manchmal kann man - oder muss sogar - auch einfach alles rot ausgefüllt werden.
Das klingt erst ziemlich komisch, spielt sich auch so, aber dann, wenn man den Haken raus hat, macht das Spiel plötzlich richtig Spaß und man hat sogar die eine oder andere kleine Kopfnuss zu knacken.
Komischerweise musste ich das vorletzte Rätsel in einer Lösung nachschauen, weil ich irgendwie nicht herausgefunden habe, in welcher Reihenfolge man die Symbole abzuarbeiten hat.
Aber dafür gibt es sicherlich auch versteckte Hinweise im Spiel.
Vermutlich war das bei dem Spiel in dem Labyrinth zu merken.
Wie man sich in einem Labyrinth fortbewegt und auf jeden Fall wieder raus kommt, weiß jeder, oder?
Das werde ich hier nicht spoilern.

Um das alles aufzupeppen, gibt es ein paar abspielbare Kassetten zu finden, auch gibt es noch weitere Zusatzerrungenschaften freizuspielen, wie z.B. vor Angst die Ritterrüstung abzuknallen, oder den Abspann ganz zu schauen, weil dort auch noch ein Rätsel drin ist. lol
Dumm fand ich das letzte Achievement, wo man in einem Computergame Zielscheiben als Rätsel lösen soll.
Tolle Idee, nur ist die benötigte Punktzahl mit 600 von 750 viel zu hoch, wenn man kein Shooterass, Rätselkönig und Besitzer passender Hardware ist, und dann ständig keine Punkte bekommt, weil man angeblich nicht genau gezeichnet hat, oder man fliegt ganz raus, weil man was auch immer falsch gedrückt haben soll, die Zielscheiben fliegen aber weiter.
Neben SAM löst das aber auf elegante Weise die Cheatengine mit etwas reduzierter Geschwindigkeit.

Die Grafik und der Sound sind auf einem ordentlichen Indie-Level, es fühlt sich fast so an, als spiele man in einer Art Lego-Welt.
Für die ca. 1-1,5 Stunden Spielzeit bekommt man genug kleine Rätsel geboten und das Entdecken der Burg und das Jagen der Errungenschaften macht ordentlich Spaß.
Da das Spiel gute Unterhaltung geboten hat und zudem kostenlos erhältlich ist, gibt es von mir natürlich ein

Fazit: zocken, zocken, zocken! :-)
 
BxBender [GER]

Good game albeit a bit short but I guess that's kinda the point. It really nailed all the things you'd expect from a parody/taking the mick kinda of game. It keeps you on your toes and gives you a laugh at all the tropes available in similar games. I strongly suggest you try it out at the very least, its free, small and not very long but it will definitely give you one or two things to think about

0
Recommandé
1.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 1 juillet 2022
Funnier and with better puzzles than most games that charge money. (WHY IS THIS FREE? DAMN)

Worth mentioning though that there's one puzzle in here that relies on sound, so it'd be inaccessible to deaf/hard-of-hearing players. That being said, The Witness didn't give a ♥♥♥♥ about that either when it was first released, and had MANY more puzzles in it that were audio-dependent than this, and even had a whole series of puzzles that were completely unsolvable if the player were colorblind, so I'm willing to give the single-person dev team of The Looker some slack in comparison!
 
VoidBurger
495 produits enregistrés

12 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
3.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 21 juin 2022
Fun and funny game that is irreverent and full of great humor. It is straight forward, but you need to think a bit outside the box to solve some of the puzzles. This game is supposed to be a spoof on "The Witness." I almost didn't play it because I hated The Witness, but this is ten times better than that and I am thoroughly enjoying it so far. Plus - It's FREE! Can't beat that price.
edit: the only achievement I can't get is for playing the "video game" which is a fast swipe kind of thing. That irks me, but for free I don't mind.

晚餐是舒肥雞沾鹽
662 produits enregistrés
0
10 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 17 mai 2023
The Looker is:
•a comedy that (usually) doesn't feel the need to explain the joke, just in case the audience missed it
•an overt parody that is simultaneously enjoyable as a parody and enjoyable in its own right
•a gag-based puzzle game, as opposed to a series of gags wearing the skin of a puzzle game, or a puzzle game with gags strewn over it like tinsel on a christmas tree
•a satirical game about The Witness, as opposed to a satire of The Witness
•a light-hearted (perhaps even good-natured) roast that reads like the work of a puzzle game fan, poking fun at his own favorites
this game feels almost like it could have been made by a turn-of-the-millennium british IT graduate while chatting on IRC and designing the most incomprehensible programming language known to man, and that's probably the highest praise it could hope to receive. so yeah, i guess i liked it

Atmoman
325 produits enregistrés
0
4 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 2 juillet 2022
This game is genuinely good.

While obviously a farcical parody of The Witness, it still manages to be fun and engaging in its own rights and is well worth playing for free. That it has another level to potentially be even better for people who either love The Witness or hate its immense pretentiousness elevates it to a prime spot.

Where satire can and often seemingly is easily used to excuse poor execution of an idea, The Looker sticks the landing near-flawlessly. Regardless of whether you loved or hated The Witness - as there seems to be no in-between among critics and players - you will probably enjoy The Looker enough to at least see it through to its end. (And honestly, the level of polish put into this game makes me think it was much more likely to have been made by someone who loves The Witness over someone who hates it.)

Polly
645 produits enregistrés
0
6 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 19 aout 2022
Gioco davvero delizioso e gratuito.
Non ho ancora giocato The Witness ma immagino che la direzione sia molto simile.

Ci ritroviamo su una isoletta di dimensioni abbastanza ridotte e all’interno di una specie di fortino affiancato da un labirinto di siepi.
All’interno di questo piccolo mondo ci muoviamo in prima persona risolvendo degli enigmi, alcuni dei quali davvero molto simpatici e ingegnosi.
Lo scopo è quello di risolvere detti enigmi per attivare una specie di generatore centrale che apre un cancello che, a sua volta, permette l’esplorazione del labirinto, al centro del quale c’è un suggerimento per poter completare l’enigma finale.

Gli enigmi sono sostanzialmente molto facili da descrivere, ma complessi da risolvere. Infatti si tratta sempre di disegnare una linea su uno schema, tra la lettera S (Start) e la lettera E (End). Le lettere spesso si trovano all’interno di un labirinto e dobbiamo unirle cercando di capire il percorso. La ingegnosità sta nel fatto che detti schemi a volte sono dei piccoli puzzle molto divertenti da risolvere.
Ad esempio, immaginate un labirinto irrisolvibile in cui l’unica soluzione è quella di percorrerlo “esternamente” per poter collegare le lettere, altrimenti mai collegabili. In un altro caso risolvendo lo schema, estremamente basilare, farete sparare delle palle di cannone in mare. In realtà dovrete usarle per abbattere delle navi, per cui dovrete capire che lo schema andrà risolto… nella giusta prospettiva…
In un altro caso le suddette lettere sembrano sempre impossibili da raggiungere, ma vi accorgerete che disegnando la linea la pittura cola… creando il percorso per la soluzione.
Davvero piacevole.

Il tutto va avanti per un paio di ore molto divertenti (almeno finché non ci si blocca, perché se non si entra nell’ottica del tipo di interazioni che è possibile fare si rischia di vagare a vuoto).

Il gioco ha però un paio di difetti che voglio sottolineare:
1- sparse per l’isola ci sono delle registrazioni, alcune delle quali presentano degli indizi per risolvere gli enigmi. A volte sono anche molto lunghe da ascoltare. Il parlato è in inglese ma senza sottotitoli. Per me è un difetto perché non viene incontro ai non anglofoni o a chi ha difficoltà nell’ascolto del parlato. Nel 2022, anche per un gioco free, direi che è un problema che sarebbe sempre bene evitare; per me è un aspetto che pesa tantissimo nel voto finale;
2- il titolo è giocabile ♥♥♥ mouse e tastiera, ma anche ♥♥♥ il controller. In quest’ultimo caso è però praticamente incompletabile, perché la sensibilità della levetta analogica per disegnare quelle linee è elevatissima: le sbaglierete tutte, tracciano scarabocchi ingestibili a caso e senza volerlo. E non esiste alcun menù di configurazione della sensibilità del movimento del pennello. Anzi, da questo punto di vista, non esiste proprio alcun menu.

E per finire, ritornando al menu, esso è costituito solo da due voci e per selezionarle bisogna tirare la linea tra la S e la E… inizialmente per me è stata una cosa così strana da non averlo capito…

Comunque consiglio di provarlo, si tratta di 2 ore divertenti ed è pure gratuito.

6.5/10

А если серьезно, The Looker - это коротенькая, достаточно креативная игра, которая хоть и эксплуатирует механики и идеи The Witness, но делает это настолько забавно и интересно, что я зачем то написал этот недообзор.

Évaluation publiée le 26 juin 2022
An extremely high effort s***-post, is in fact a literal work of art in its own right.
If you have played The Witness thoroughly, then this is the game you must also complete.

The Looker expands upon and supersedes all aspects of The Witness, with philosophical revelations that are genuinely life changing.

Do not miss this nuanced exploration of the human condition

嫌いだった人も、オチのためだけにやる価値あり！

Kaemble

5 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
1.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 18 juin 2022
I met a game developer from an antique land
Who said: Two vast and trunkless lines of permanent marker
Stand in the paper. Near them, on the page,
Half smudged, a poorly drawn dong lies, whose balls,
And wrinkled tip, and curls of long hair,
Tell that its sculptor well those passions read
Which yet survive, stamped on this lifeless ween,
The hand that mocked them and the heart that fed:
And on the pedestal this meme appears:
"Road work ahead;
I sure hope it does!"
Nothing beside remains. Round the decay
Of that colossal peen, boundless and bare
The lone and level page stretches far away.
 
tirrene
0
4 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 27 février 2023
The Looker
Mé celkové hodnocení: [64%]

KLADY:
+ free a dobré
+ vskutku pobavilo
+ pár zajímavých hádanek

CELKOVÉ SHRNUTÍ:
Jakožto správná satira/parodie, je The Looker třeskutě vtipná hra, napěchovaná referencemi, která s humorem poukazuje na problémy a kýče originálního díla.
The Looker má své kouzlo, vskutku nápadité a dobré hádanky, i když nemnoho.
A ačkoliv by se dalo očekávat, že takováto hra nebude zpracovaná příliš svědomitě není tomu tak - vypadá hezky, vše funguje jak má, rozesměje a na chvilku dobře zabaví, navíc je free, takže se vyplatí odzkoušet.
 
slendy
298 produits enregistrés
0
5 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
0.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 18 juillet 2022
The Looker zeigt sich grafisch auf der Unity-Plattform & das gar nicht mal schlecht. In einer schönen Welt werden Rätsel gelöst, um im Spiel vorwärts zu kommen. Dazu wird mit einem Stift auf einer Tafel Start & Ende verbunden. Aber auch nicht immer. Der Schwierigkeitsgrad steigert sich leicht & manche Rätsel bringen die wenigen Hirnzellen schon mal ins Schwitzen. Für mich reichte es in 45 Minuten für zwei Errungenschaften. Yeah! Ob das gut ist, lässt sich gerne überprüfen, denn The Looker kommt kostenlos daher! Und für kostenlos ist es qualitativ wirklich gut aufgestellt. Die Soundbeiträge, leider komplett in englischer Sprache, wie das gesamte Spiel, runden das Spiel trotzdem & zusätzlich gut ab. Von daher meine uneingeschränkte Empfehlung!

Weitere knackige Reviews findet Ihr hier: NICE-REVIEWS

This is by far the greatest game I've ever played. It has story, depth, challenge, and so much more I can't comprehend how this game is so life changing, the ending was so inspirational, it was truly a masterpiece.

ItsAviLol
0
5 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
5.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 septembre 2022
TLDR Free, funny and clever, if you enjoyed The Witness but found some “flaws” in its grandiosity, you’ll want to try out The Looker [17/20⭐, 2h (+2h challenge)🏅, 2/5💡 (4/5💡 challenge)]

Context First, let me say that despite the pretentiousness, I’m a huge fan of The Witness. The Looker is a parody of The Witness, reverting some of its more questionable aspects for humorous effect.

Writing Much like The Witness, there isn’t any actual narrative, you’re just dropped on an island and are expected to solve puzzles. There are also the occasional logs spread throughout the island, which provide comments as insightful as you might expect (hint buttons are the best).

Aesthetics The style of The Looker imitates that of The Witness, but of course without the intricate world building. The soundtrack is also well-chosen.

Gameplay Puzzles are mazes where the player has to freehand draw the solution. This proves to be the most negative aspect of the game: at least in my machine, the response of the controls was very poor which didn’t make for a pleasant experience (and made the mini-game impossible to win). The puzzles aren’t really to be taken serious and mostly revert your expectation. Many of them require the player to think outside the box and explore the surrounding environment, but nothing too difficult.

There are no deadends nor game-overs. You can save the game anywhere, but only when quitting and you can’t load the previous save. It lacks some basic features like a settings menu.

Value I doubt there are many free games as clever and well-made as The Looker, although I’m not sure whether the irony will work with players that haven’t played The Witness. The main game took me about 2h to beat, and then I wasted another 2h trying to beat “the challenge” of the last achievement (eventually I realized that it simply wasn’t feasible in my low spec machine and I had to switch to a different setup). Considering that The Witness’ "challenge" also wasn’t particularly entertaining, I guess this was all part of devs’ plan. The other achievements are simple and mostly related to the progress, they can be done in a single run. There is a single progress slot and you can revisit previous puzzles but they will be solved. Replayable only for the jokes.

For more puzzle-game reviews and curated lists check out the Puzzle Trove.
 
macwh

10 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile

1
Recommandé
0.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 13 juillet 2022
It's been a long time since I've played a game that genuinely made me laugh.

The Looker is, of course, a parody of Jonathan Blow's critically acclaimed puzzle game The Witness, with plenty of creative gags up its sleeve, including numerous clever nods to the source material. Given that, you wouldn't expect much in the realm of good gameplay, but there actually were a good deal of puzzles that were well-thought out with creative solutions. The audio logs have got to be some of the most comedic bits.

7/10

Recommandé
1.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 20 juin 2022
Jonathan Blow a écrit :
He visto los primeros 30 segundos del video y no parecía haber entendido mi juego particularmente bien, así que no vi más. [...] Me molesta, porque tiene unas 100.000 visitas, y todo el mundo cita ese video y me quedo como "este pavo... lo entiende, un poco, pero no lo suficiente como para explicárselo a 100.000 personas."
- Jonathan Blow, criticando un video-crítica de 40 minutos sobre su último juego, The Witness. A día de hoy ese video tiene 5 millones de visitas, y podemos asumir que su frustración se ha multiplicado por 50. Maravilloso.

Pobre Blow. Debe ser una jodiendа lo de ser un reptiliano y que la raza humana no entienda tus juegos de mierdа. Y encima ahora la gente dedica horas de su tiempo a crear juegos ♥♥♥ el único propósito de resaltar lo sumamente pretencioso que eres. The Looker es una buena parodia, recomendable tanto si te encanta The Witness o si lo odias. Te echarás unas risas, y dura menos que ese "puzzle" del TW que consiste en ver una película de hora y media. Pero sin duda lo mejor de todo es que hay cierto calvo al que le está saliendo humo de las orejas por el hecho de que mucha gente esté disfrutando un juego que desvirtua el mensaje de su juego. Sea el que sea. Algo de una bomba atómica, creo.

This game was pretty short (like 2 hours doing all achievements) but absolutely awesome. I highly recommend playing it without a guide, because the puzzles are well thought through but at the same time not hard. Don't try to do "On Rails" you will regret it. And try to explore as much as possible, there are recordings and hints hidden around the map, also watch the credits to the end.

Évaluation publiée le 20 juin 2022
Потрясающая бесплатная игра-головоломка.

Очень классная механика с рисованием, хоть и просто, но очень интересно)
Все сравнивают с Witness, да, похоже, да возможно даже и лучше, ну и пускай, это же здорово)
Проходится максимум за 1 час, можно и быстрее, если не тупить в некоторых местах)
Короче, однозначно советую, тут 12 из 10 Антошек, что в это надо однозначно играть!)


И да, каждый может нарисовать все что угодно в меру своей испорченности :D

big yoshi
0
4 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
0.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 26 juin 2022
I think The Witness is probably in my top ten games of all time, and is probably one of the best puzzle games ever made. At the same time, I think jonathan blow is a nerd who probably should have been bullied more in school. In terms of the "Great Game made by a Horrible Person" ratio, I think i'd have to have to give it to the guy who is an anti-vaxxer and thinks women are biologically worse at programming than men.

This is all to say that despite loving The Witness, I think it also deserves to be made fun of. I was wary regardless, as I know a ton of "parody games" on steam that are dedicated to having the least funny jokes possible for an hour and still manage to rake in "overwhelmingly positive" reviews. Despite this, I think The Looker manages to be a very good game in comparison. I'd say my personal laugh rate to the jokes was about 50/50. The game itself looks impressively similar to The Witness, and I thought there was some really creative gameplay elements as well. It goes beyond (most) of the low-hanging fruit you'd expect and actually sets up some good punchlines. The game starts to fall apart near the end when you actually have to do real witness-style "shape puzzles", and I looked up the answer immediately because I couldn't be bothered due to the accuracy needed from your mouse movements in the first place. This is all made up for by the ending, which I think was the highlight of the entire game.

Do you need to play The Witness to enjoy this game? I guess not, but you'd be losing the context for a lot of the funniest jokes. At the end of the day it's a free game, but I think this was worth the bandwidth and (temporary) space on my hard drive, which is more than I can say for most "parody" titles out there.
 
Kerma
525 produits enregistrés
0
3 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 22 juin 2022
The Looker is an excellent parody of The Witness. You'll appreciate the jokes much better if you played The Witness for a good chunk of time. You can expect puzzles, dumb jokes, clever solutions, and dumb references.

It's just the right length too and does not outstay its welcome. Well done!

Bennet
349 produits enregistrés

2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile

1.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 mai 2023
ОФИГЕННАЯ пародия на The Witness, которую я тоже люблю, и все ждала, когда сделают нечто подобное. Оказывается, сделали, да еще и бесплатную! Это реально качественная пародия, которая подсветила странные моменты в Уитнессе, вроде раскиданных везде душноватых по содержанию диктофонов и малопонятных механизмов, но при этом сами головоломки в Лукере – интересные! И так же необычно развивается базовая механика головоломки, как это сделано в Уитнесе. А уж последняя головоломка – вообще огонь (стебет механику, которая, насколько помню, в Уитнессе была необязательной). Короче, это шедевр, если бы была еще одна такая игра за деньги, я б купила. 10/10

Vidéo YouTube™: Subday - игры от подписчиков, ноябрь 2022

Коротка, але захоплююча головоломка

Всі задачі пов'язані зі створенням лінії поміж однією точкою та іншою. Питання тільки в тому, як саме це варто зробити. А там, де здається, немає рішення - треба мислити більш творчо.

Гра тривалістю на 2 години. Можливо трохи більше, якщо геть не знатимете, що робити далі.

Ну а кінцівка гри - шедевр, плакали всім селом. Ніякі там "Last of Us" чи "Bioshock" не зрівняються із закінченням цієї гри.

"Free to play Witness"
Kdo nehrál The Witness a je mu líto za to utratit pár peněz, může zkusit The Looker. Je to podařený klon (místy i parodie) co se týká hádanek i nápadů kolem. Hra není tak komplexní, co se týká do velikosti, komplexnosti i detailnosti, ale vzhledem k tomu, že je zdarma, jí to nelze vytýkat. Závěr hezky pobavil.
(Jediné, co mohlo být lepší, je optimalizace, aby se to nesekalo.)
 
Cuba144_CZ
949 produits enregistrés
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 20 juin 2022
Follow "First Person Exploration and Puzzle Games" for more games like this!

A satirical puzzle game inspired by The Witness. It has actual puzzles (a handful of which would've fit in great in The Witness), along with some joke puzzles and humorous audio clips. There's about an hour of content.

The game doesn't look right with HDR, with no way to turn it off. Also the last two puzzles don't work correctly - I had to solve them multiple times before they registered as "solved".

Despite those minor qualms, this game is worth playing for anyone who enjoyed The Witness.
 
BlueRaja
4,031 produits enregistrés
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
0.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 8 décembre 2022
The Looker isn't just a creative video-game "diss track" of The Witness, it's a well-written drama of twists and turns that's certain to elicit a wide range of emotions.

You'll laugh at audiotapes describing everything from Nigerian Prince scams to Bobby Fischer's love for chess. You'll cry at this dev's beautiful rendition of Gravity's Rainbow, a book people have definitely read. Maybe you'll even poop yourself during the game's homage to P.T. followed by anger when you remember how Konami screwed Kojima and Guillermo over.

Move over Elden Ring, God of War, Stray, and Signalis. The Looker is the game of the year.
 
The Count of Monte Crisco

1.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 11 juin 2023
This game made me rethink my outlook on puzzle games, and I came to the realisation that I was right all along: life is just like one giant puzzle game, and death is like the time I fell off my tricycle (with training wheels too, I mean, how do you fall off a vehicle with FIVE wheels!?).

You can try to connect the dots, but sooner or later you're gonna take the plunge so you're gonna have to prepare for that. I'd recommend a helmet and shoulder pads, maybe even a sixth wheel. Life is too short to really understand where the sixth wheel came from, some guy on E-bay called Bartholomew sold it to me for, like, 12,and said he made sure to baptise it in holy water this time.

YEAH WELL CLEARLY YOU DIDN'T BAPTISE IT ENOUGH BECAUSE IT STILL SCREAMS EVERY TIME I TOUCH IT, BART.

What was I talking about again?

Évaluation publiée le 1 juillet 2022
Stanley parable style humor remixed with The Witness puzzles. Outstanding work.

Rumor has it that this was secretly developed under a pseudonym by the developer of Fez, Phil "fishfingers" Manstachio, in an attempt to break back into the scene after his failed rap career, but I give these whispers no credence. Let that name rest eternal. He has earned it. Interesting notions, though.
 
Superbeef

2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile

Recommandé
1.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 16 juillet 2023
En el vasto océano del arte y la creatividad, existe una joya deslumbrante que se eleva por encima de todas las demás: el juego de puzzle que es una verdadera obra maestra. Su intrincada simplicidad, su poder para desafiar nuestras mentes y su capacidad para deleitar nuestros sentidos, lo convierten en un tesoro eterno de la humanidad.

Desde el momento en que se desvela ante nosotros, somos transportados a un universo de maravilla y asombro. Cada pieza encaja ♥♥♥ una precisión exquisita, formando un tapiz de colores, formas y patrones que despiertan nuestra curiosidad y nos incitan a explorar aún más. ♥♥♥ cada movimiento estratégico, nos acercamos a la resolución, saboreando el deleite de cada conexión descubierta.

Este juego de puzzle es una sinfonía de ingenio y creatividad. Cada nivel fue cuidadosamente diseñado, desafiándonos a superar obstáculos aparentemente insuperables. Pero a medida que nos sumergimos más profundamente en sus enigmas, descubrimos una verdad fundamental: somos capaces de superar cualquier desafío ♥♥♥ paciencia, perspicacia y perseverancia.

Sus efectos visuales nos cautivan, sus melodías nos envuelven en una atmósfera de éxtasis intelectual. Cada giro y cada vuelta de su trama narrativa nos mantienen en vilo, deseando más, anhelando la satisfacción de resolver el último acertijo.

Este juego de puzzle, una piedra preciosa en el legado cultural de la humanidad, trasciende los límites del entretenimiento. Nos enseña la importancia de la lógica, la habilidad para pensar de manera creativa y la capacidad de encontrar soluciones innovadoras. Nos invita a expandir nuestras mentes y a enfrentar desafíos ♥♥♥ valentía y determinación.

En resumen, este juego es una completa pedazo de mierda. Mierda de la buena.

English:

In the vast ocean of human art and creativity, there exists a dazzling gem that rises above all others: the puzzle game that is a true masterpiece. Its intricate simplicity, its power to challenge our minds, and its ability to delight our senses make it an eternal treasure in the history of humankind.

From the moment it unveils itself before us, we are transported to a universe of wonder and awe. Each piece fits with exquisite precision, forming a tapestry of colors, shapes, and patterns that ignite our curiosity and beckon us to explore further. With each strategic move, we inch closer to resolution, savoring the delight of every discovered connection.

This puzzle game is a symphony of wit and creativity. Every level is meticulously crafted, challenging us to overcome seemingly insurmountable obstacles. But as we delve deeper into its puzzles, we uncover a fundamental truth: we are capable of surmounting any challenge with patience, insight, and perseverance.

Its visual effects captivate us, its melodies envelop us in an atmosphere of intellectual ecstasy. Every twist and turn of its narrative keeps us on the edge, yearning for more, craving the satisfaction of solving the ultimate riddle.

This puzzle game, a gem in the cultural legacy of humanity, transcends the boundaries of entertainment. It teaches us the importance of logic, the ability to think creatively, and the capacity to find innovative solutions. It invites us to expand our minds and confront challenges with courage and determination.

In summary, this game is a complete piece of ♥♥♥♥. Grade-A ♥♥♥♥.

An excellent game!

Humour, Puzzles, Subversion of expectations, a lovely art style, what's not to love? It's evident an enormous amount of love and care was put into this game, every corner and crevice is packed with an odd bit of commentary, or humorous object, or even a humorously talkative object.

Pixilly
115 produits enregistrés
0
3 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 26 juin 2022
元ネタThe Witness とその作者ジョナサン・ブロウへの敬意に満ちたギャグゲーです。
しかしコメディといえどちゃんとパズルもひねられておりThe Witnessをやっていた時の楽しさを思い出させてくれました。
元ネタをやっていなくても全然楽しめますが、作中では結構オマージュというかジョークの下地にしているところがあるので是非元ネタもやってみて欲しい。オーディオログは堅苦しい感はあるが内容は興味深いしパズルそのものは最高級と言っていいので。
短いけどジョークは溢れるほどあり、かなり笑わせてくれました。特に衝撃的な最後にはやられましたね。
無料ゲームなのにクオリティがすごくいい事には驚いた、面白いアホなゲームを作れるのは頭のいい人なんだなと実感しました。
