Sr.Gringis
1
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 3 janvier 2023
Tongue firmly planted in cheek , The Looker is what any parody should aspire to be : at the same time both scathing and loving and a product perfectly capable of standing on its own. It doesn't feel to me that this game is an attack against JB or the whole concept of overt intellectualism , it feels rather more like a reminder of an important concept : truly brilliant minds know how to take a joke. Even a crass one. Even one about a giant c...
 
Evilpellu
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
1.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 11 novembre 2022
After completing the campaign i can say that there was never a game such as this that I've played. From the story, to the drama and funny moments you endure in the game to the sad and grief you feel as the game progresses, you really do take the persona of an outlaw & a good man afterall.

Opening of the game sets such a perfect tone for what you encounter in the next few hours of the game which really do leave a huge impact on the overall experience. You get to slowly know the main protagonist Arthur Morgan and how he develops as a character throughout the story and how world around him really tightens the band on the lifestyle him and his gang knew.

From the sheer amount of mechanics to the extreme realism of the world around you, you can get immersed in this world and spend countless hours just roaming, hunting & exploring the world you live in.

At the end of the game i was really attached to the main character and the journey that what was inevitably coming to an end. Sadness you feel after completing the game left me with bitter feeling for days after i have finished the game, which made me realize,

Red Dead Redemption 2 truly is a masterpiece.

1.6 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 24 juin 2022
This is literally just a ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ on The Witness and I love it. You should at least look up The Witness and see what its about and some of the gameplay before playing this. Surprisingly some of the puzzles in this game are quite clever for a short free game.

Protip: To continue or exit the game from the escape menu, you need to actually draw a line using the mouse from the start to the end next to the buttons. No buttons here, only drawing lines

springphul
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 22 juin 2022
I genuinely enjoyed The Witness, despite all of its flaws. I got both achievements that game had. I liked the dumb over-the-top intellectualism it had.
I also absolutely ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥ loved The Looker. You can tell the developer of this game beat it, or at least watched a Let's Play, as the audio logs (mostly) parody existing ones in The Witness and the pre-credits and post-credits scenes both mirror the original's two endings. It even mocks the semi-spooky parts of The Witness. A lot of love and care went into making this game appealing to both fans of and haters of The Witness. Sadly there is no Soulja Boy joke at the Braid part.

Jadex
531 produits enregistrés
0
4 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 juin 2022
I really enjoyed the Witness but the pretentiousness of it really ruined the experience, and only became worse and the game went on. This game, The Looker, does not fix any of my issues but does and amazing job of highlighting, poking fun at, and out right slapping you in the face with them. This is all achieved while having a short, beautiful, and all round fun game to play. If you have an hour to spare then give this game a go, and it is almost a must if you have played the Witness and feel the same way as I do.

Recommandé
1.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 23 novembre 2022
I was worried at first that a parody of The Witness would all too easily have fallen to the trap of simply pointing and laughing at the original for being a "w-art-ing simulator", but I was plesantly surprised to see it be seemingly quite respectful of the original, while still having witty and funny puzzles to entertain.

All in all, I'd've paid 2.99€ for this

Exxon Waldemar

desangre
1,826 produits enregistrés
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 25 juin 2022
The Looker is a parody of The Witness. Having not played that game, I still greatly appreciated this one. Despite being what seems to be a joke, the gameplay is genuinely enjoyable and well done. The experience is paced extremely well, no part overstays its welcome.
I feel a developer with this sort of talent could easily over indulge in the parody aspect and create a game that fails to stand up on its own. The Looker avoids this with grace, weaving in enjoyable, well executed jokes with a whimsy that many other games should aspire to. It does all this while the puzzles themselves are enjoyable in their own right. The final puzzle in particular really sold the experience for me, being uniquely stupid. The game is very well made, and thoroughly enjoyable.

Update: I have now played a small amount (2 hrs) of The Witness. The game has become even funnier.
 
Jsburg
321 produits enregistrés

2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile

Évaluation publiée le 27 juin 2022
free short little piss take of jon blow. and yes, i say specifically jon blow and not the witness, because it kind of fails to understand how the witness worked as a puzzle game and is more focused on mocking jon blow's absurdly oversized pretentious ego. very funny, and worth playing, though.

⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⡿⠿⠛⠛⠛⠛⠿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿⣿ C O C K

not-so-timely parody of The Witness, that manages to be a pretty decent puzzle game in its own right, especially for a free game. Would probably find it funnier if I'd gotten further into the game it's parodying, but I still had a good time with it.

Meowish
0
3 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 6 juillet 2022
我绝不会把这部有趣的作品称为《The Witness》的粗劣模仿，它是另一部完整的作品，而且作者一定是相当了解《The Witness》的。
这部《The Looker》与大名鼎鼎的《The Witness》之间的关系就像《蒙娜丽莎》与杜尚的《L.H.O.O.Q》（俗称小胡子的蒙娜丽莎）
况且杜尚那副画的名字还是个法语谐音色情笑话，和游戏结尾那个 玩家亲自画的巨大的 叽霸 还有Johnny Suck ，简直是天作一对的类比。
这部作品推荐给任何见证者的爱好者，一定要试一试，它是一部不算精致但也足够有趣的解构式的小作品，是作者射向Jonathan Blow达达主义式的一发子弹，我必须说，我无法拒绝这种粗暴而令人惊喜的幽默，而且，用一整部作品去践行这种幽默，这种行为绝对值得尊敬

Nice concept and execution but it throws the consistency out the window half way through with what and where you can draw on, which I didn't mind so much.

Only issue i have is the last puzzle, it doesn't look or feel like a puzzle and gives no immediate indication of how to solve it and feels like it's being brute forced more than solved.

All in all, solid game, but I'd scrap the last puzzle.

261 produits enregistrés
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile

Recommandé
1.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 22 décembre 2022
Doesn't just subvert "The Witness" but also walking simulators and puzzle games in general. Notably, the audio logs are all genuinely funny. Yes it's short, but it hits the mark without overstaying its welcome.

Also, after nearly 10k reviews at a 97%-positive clip, Valve could step in and remove the "Profile Features Limited" tag but noooooo that's reserved for revenue-generating games like 'Bundled Icons RPG' and 'Naughty Anime Jigsaw Puzzle 7'.
 
Zoelef
575 produits enregistrés
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 29 septembre 2022
Giochino free che fa il verso a… serve specificarlo? The Witness, però lo fa in modo intelligente. Laddove il gioco di Blow ci faceva tracciare delle linee da un pallino, poi declinate in mille puzzle diversi, questo la mette giù più semplice: si inizia da “Start” e si finisce su “End”, tracciando una linea pixelosa col mouse su vari schemi, labirinti o altro.
Non pensate neanche di giocarlo col controller, se si toccano le “pareti” degli schemi si deve ricominciare, e già col mouse si deve stare spesso andare piano e bene attenti a come tracciare le linee, sperando che non vada in obliquo per un’angolazione sbagliata della telecamera.

Ci sono diversi puzzle che variano la formula “Start-End” in modi imprevedibili e non sempre immediati, alcuni minigiochi facoltativi, una serie di registrazioni audio “filosofiche” che non hanno alcun senso, un cartello di Aiuto che non vi aiuta affatto e in generale una parodia per ciascun elemento cardine di The Witness (anche la grafica è simile).

Dura un’oretta e mezza e non è molto difficile, a volte serve un po’ di pensiero laterale per procedere, ma l’epico finale merita decisamente.
Da provare visto che è gratis, ma lo consiglierei solo a chi ha ben presente The Witness per cogliere appieno ogni riferimento e farsi una bella risata.
 
Lucathegreat
971 produits enregistrés
0

Funny parody of The Witness, a bit like if it was mixed with a little of The Stanley Parable. Puzzles range from very simple to quite challenging, but I personally found most of them fairly intuitive to figure out. The one thing I had to abandon was the optional 'On Rails' achievement, which I just don't have enough coordination to manage.

1.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 25 juin 2022
Loved The Witness but oh boy does that game pale in comparison to The Looker in almost every regard. The Looker has significantly more deep introspection, fun references that I get because I'm a gamer, and a great ending that makes you really think about what you've done. Only thing The Witness has over The Looker is a couple more puzzles and a gauntlet.
 
Echo
397 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 25 juin 2022
If you've played The Witness, this game is a must-play. The Looker is a parody game which pokes fun at the more pretentious elements of the original game's ideas and features. While it could've been primed for a brutal deconstruction, The Looker instead looks fondly upon The Witness's ideas and manages to come out the other end with a couple clever puzzles and ideas of its own. There are many gags played for laughs, and it's worth it to see everything this free title has to offer. My one criticism is a set of late-game puzzles including symbols which logic didn't seem to check out for (which I'm not sure is the point or not).
 
pluggedintogaming

0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 8 novembre 2022
ライン引き謎解きゲー
スタートからゴールまで線を引いたりしてパズルを解いていく謎解きゲーム（ムービーを見ればやり方が分かるがのでネタバレではないはず）。全てにおいて共通したルールがあるので、あとはどう頭をひねるかという話になってやりやすかった。「The Witness」っぽいノリではあるが、もっと単純で、短く、遊びやすい。
ただ１つのルールでここまで色んなジャンルがやれるのかと、凄いと思った。

分からん！という場合はガイドにウォークスルーがあるのでそれを見ても良いと思う（私は見た）。解けないパズルは攻略を見ても良いから最後までプレイして欲しいゲーム。最後までプレイしないと意味がないとは言わないが意味がない。

Pariah
148 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.6 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 27 juin 2022
This game not only acts as a brilliant parody of The Witness, but also a mini-spiritual-successor. Lots of people are uncharitably calling this game 'The Witness without the thing everyone hates: Jonathan Blow'. It appears both The Looker and The Witness are games most players miss the point of, and games where missing the point makes you hate Jonathan Blow.

The Looker is a love letter to The Witness, showing off everything good about the original game while bringing its faults to a comical extreme. The Witness was a great game with many flaws that's received quite a few great critiques with many flaws, and The Looker makes light of both sides. Don't mistake this game for a potshot at Jonathan Blow, it's a labour of love that could only arise through the perfect mix of appreciation for the original game and a realistic understanding of its flaws.

Love or hate The Witness, you'll love The Looker.
 
Jinan Dangor

commandoby
215 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 27 septembre 2023
As others have said, it is a parody of The Witness. The puzzles are relatively easy and the gameplay is very much a walking simulator. Still, for the price of free, you get an entertaining hour or so of comedy and light puzzle work. I would recommend this to most any light puzzle fans. If you are looking for a challenge, look elsewhere. The puzzles are mainly here as a stepping stone to the next joke.

8/10. Funny and worth a play through, but it isn't going to awe you. The game contains next to no replay value but that just means you can uninstall easily when you are finished.
 
Meowser
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 1 octobre 2022
见证者的解构恶搞游戏，包括谜题、画面风格、甚至steam商店页面的布置都在强烈戏仿暗示见证者

强烈建议游玩见证者后游玩，很多恶搞和既视感是真的能一边玩一边笑出声，尤其是做到最后的“环境谜题” obelisk，以及通关后的现实视频，对见证者玩家效果拔群，喜剧效果拉满，可以说是非常巨魔了

作为解密游戏本身质量也不错，像这类要求"thinking out of the box"的谜题做不好就很容易变成硬穷举和制作人对电波，本作虽说也有这种情况但总体都还好，每个点都有逻辑上或场景上的提示

指南和社区中心里都是人才（

474 produits enregistrés

1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile

Recommandé
1.9 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 juin 2022
This game presents itself as a joke. It's not. It's a real passion project, that took time and dedication and endless creativity. The humor is on point, the puzzles are clever, the references make me laugh harder than I'd like to admit.

Some puzzles overstood their welcome cause I didn't understand their catch. (a certain arcade game, and I spent a bit too long trapped in the hedge maze), but the game is short and sweet. If you loved the Witness this will be a joy to go through, trust me.

Myst
897 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 28 juin 2022
I was pleasantly surprised by this game. The puzzles are smart and the game itself is pretty hilarious. Parody games can often end up being lackluster because they focus more on poking fun than they do on being fun or well designed - this one nails both. It's a legit puzzle game that also happens to be spot on with the parody (and I say this as a HUGE fan of The Witness). It's short but about the length it needed to be.

I feel like I should have paid for this? Where can I send my money?

ColdPie
212 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
1.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 18 juin 2022
This is one of the best games I've ever played. After spending 60+ hours completing all zones and finishing the game, I wholeheartedly believe this game is worth the full $0 pricetag.

The biggest complaint about The Looker is its difficulty. Honestly, the game is difficult. The Looker does not hold your hand - but that's part of what makes it so fun. Every tough puzzle is a potential accomplishment. When I first heard about the game, I was disappointed by its similarity to the Myst series (which I am a huge fan of). I thought, "this game is just a bunch of dumb line puzzles". As I played on, I saw the similarities between the games come together - the game is entirely about lateral thinking and how well you can apply it; NOT some romp from logic puzzle to logic puzzle.

You know a game is good when you get up to head out for lunch and you spend the entire 2 hours thinking about how to solve a difficult puzzle. You REALLY know it's good when you get home and that time spent thinking and that fresh perspective actually get you somewhere.

I still have the obelisks to complete and the challenge puzzle which will probably add another 20-30 hours to getting 100%... but I have been spoiled. There won't be another puzzle/adventure game this good in years.
 
stormtamer
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.7 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 18 juin 2022
Now this is a puzzle game

Deckiode
252 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 14 octobre 2022
If you like Jonathan Blow's puzzle games, this one will be great for you. It takes a humorous look at Witness while still providing pretty entertaining puzzles. If you're unfamiliar with them, I recommend playing or at least trying the Witness first.

Visually it's pretty much same as the Witness, somewhat cartoony. Soundtrack is scarce, but fitting. Voice acting is alright. Generally it's on point, but sounded weird a few times.

The main puzzle mechanic is drawing lines between two points. I generally liked the puzzle design and how they sometimes force you to get creative. The game also provides some hints in various forms, though they are not obvious at times. Still, I managed to get through the game without any serious hiccups.

The main thing I didn't like about the game is that the line drawing mechanic sometimes felt a bit unforgiving. For example, I draw a long complex line through a twisted maze, accidentally touch a wall, then try to fix it by drawing the line a bit back so that the whole line appears connected, but the game still doesn't register it when I get to the end. Basically, I solved the puzzle and know the solution, but because of my motorics I fail to get through. Still, there were just a few moments like this, and overall I greatly enjoyed the game.
 
rizzin
390 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
1.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 26 juin 2022
Member when that Guy made Braid on the Ek Bok and it was cool cuz it was kind of like Mario only with some Philosophy and junk in it but then the Guy kind of lost his mind and expected people to give him twenty bucks to play that game you used to get for free on the place mat at Denny's only juiced up for Autistic people?

This Man does.

And the Man wasn't even pretentious enough of a prick to charge you for all the time and effort he spent making the game from Red Lobster fun (and funny) again. Give the Man a hug at least if you see him. He is far less insane than the Guy.

Évaluation publiée le 4 janvier
A very cute spoof on 'The Witness'. Couple little puzzles of its own but the concept is always the same. A little bit of literal outside the box thinking is all it takes.

I could have sworn my dude did the Mario "Wahoo!" after I tried to jump a few times. Some other fun little easter eggs and some juvenile humor.

Amusing way to spend about an hour, and for free too!

skrrat skidi brat brat boom
154 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
2.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 6 juillet 2023
JUÉGALO ES GOTY 🔥 y a continuación como hacer una tarta de chocolate para 8 personas:

Dificultad: Fácil

Tiempo total 15 m
Elaboración 5 m
Cocción 10 m

Galletas tipo María 200 g
Mantequilla a temperatura ambiente 100 g
Chocolate negro para postres 250 g
Leche entera 1
Cuajada en polvo sobres 2
Azúcar 50 g
Chocolate blanco para decorar 100 g

Trituramos las galletas dentro de una bolsa de plástico bien cerrada y pasando por encima un rodillo. Agregamos la mantequilla a temperatura ambiente o, incluso mejor, ligeramente fundida. Mezclamos bien para obtener una masa homogénea. Cubrimos la base y laterales de un molde desmoldable de 25 cm, aplastando bien para compactar, y guardamos en la nevera o congelador para que endurezca.

Mientras tanto preparamos el relleno. Picamos el chocolate y lo calentamos en un cacito junto ♥♥♥ la leche, los dos sobres de cuajada y el azúcar durante 10 minutos. Removemos bien para que no queden grumos. Vertemos sobre la base de galletas y dejamos cuajar en la nevera durante cuatro horas aproximadamente. ♥♥♥ un pelador hacemos virutas de chocolate blanco y decoramos la tarta en el momento de servir.

Conclusiones de la tarta, ¿ eres de los que se la come o de los que se sienta en ella ? 🤨
 
69_andres_69
52 produits enregistrés
0

THEsandwich
102 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
1.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 31 mai 2023
It may have originally come out in 2022, but The Looker took 2023 by storm, and it's deserving of that spotlight. Subcreation Studio has made the tense, single-player fun of in-person puzzle games like The Witness on PC with a flourish. And the great times I've had solving, shooting, and crying my way through its charming logical world got me wondering why it took so long for this sort of game to catch on. There are still a linear technical hitches to be worked out, just like the sussy lines on Snek, but that hasn't kept me from coming back to it again and again in my down time.

Profound experience with very large ambitions.

Every second of this masterpiece challenges your perception and sense of worth.

Never have I seen a puzzle quite like any in this work of art.

I doubt I will ever experience anything quite like it.

Simple parody does not cover it, it subverts everything about it's source material, 10/10.

unboltedglobe
92 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
1
Recommandé
2.0 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 15 janvier 2023
Progression du jeu : Terminé (2h)


Gameplay ❤️❤️❤️❤️🤍
Puzzle game parodique de "The Witness" (je n'étais pas au courant au moment où je l'ai allumé), on y retrouve le même principe à savoir un enchaînement de puzzle sur le même principe de plus en plus dur. À la différence qu'il nous amènera souvent à devoir penser autrement et revoir notre façon d'aborder les choses.
Beaucoup de mécaniques différentes, voir même d'ambiances différentes !
Si on pouvait lui trouver des défauts, je dirais que forcément si les puzzle c'est pas votre truc ça risque d'être compliqué pour accrocher, que le jeu ne propose pas de sous-titre et n'est doublé qu'en anglais, et ausi... Fu**ing Snèk et sa RNG horrible !

Histoire ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
Géniale. Un jeu basé principalement sur la reflection, la culture, et sur un twist final qui ne vous laissera pas indifférent !
Beaucoup de références aux jeux indés.

Graphismes ❤️❤️❤️❤️🤍
On y retrouve toute l'ambiance et le visuel de The Witness. Je n'ai trouvé aucun défaut si ce n'est de ne pas pouvoir changer les réglages.

Musique/SoundFX ❤️❤️❤️❤️🤍
Très sobre, sert parfaitement le propos... Sauf pour cette musique du Snèk... Oui.... Encore ce Snèk...

Prix ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
Alors là un travail pareil, et le donner gratuitement ça force le respect !!! Merci infiniment !


NOTE GLOBALE ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
Vous aimez les puzzle games et les jeux indés en général ? Ne cherchez plus, vous en avez un devant vous qui mérite qu'on s'y attarde. Recommande !

Vidéo youtube de mon test :
Vidéo YouTube™: The Looker [ONE SHOT] 
Vues : 29
Découverte et let's play du puzzle game indé fait par Subcreation Studio. Enregistré lors du live du 14/01/2023. Lien du jeu ► https://store.steampowered.com/app/1985690/The_Looker/ Évaluation Steam...


Cette évaluation ne reflète que mon point de vue sur le contenu et le temps que j'ai consacré au jeu. Il n'est ni objectif, ni absolu.

The Looker is a great spoof, but stands on its own as a cheeky puzzle game even if you haven't played The Witness. Very funny, some of the puzzles made me actually think, and a certain minigame had me almost losing my mind trying to get a highscore. It's free, play it.
 
KarmaPolice911
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 13 janvier 2023
The post-credits scenes also came under heavy scrutiny and became a joke in the eyes of the general public due to the failed fan service, confusing and incoherent explanation, and dialogue. Kate Erbland of IndieWire stated, "This is confusing stuff, and the appearance of Keaton in a pair of scenes does little to help the sense that Morbius is mostly incoherent, or at least very at odds with whatever it's trying to say." Paul Tassi of Forbes said that Adrian Toomes' motivation made little sense and opined that "all of this seems... pretty poorly mapped out at the moment... It's more like stole Toomes from the MCU rather than added Morbius to the MCU, which was more the original implication." Julia Glassman of The Mary Sue found the overall reveal weak, stating, "I'm beginning to wonder if Sony just... doesn't quite get the point of scenes." Time Out's Cathy Brennan felt that the film's "attempts" to "court an audience by dangling a potential connection" to the MCU's Spider-Man is "the worst kind of unearned fan service in a film this lacklustre."

Évaluation publiée le 17 octobre 2022
Genuinely creative puzzles, and a pretty funny parody. Longest it will take is probably an hour and a half to two hours, worth a play, especially if you enjoy a certain other line game that is in no way related to Witnessing events and lines.
 
77gameboy
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
3.2 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 17 octobre 2022
This is an amazing parody of The Witness. Without spoiling The Witness, it made some questionable and rather polarizing game design decisions that disappointed and frustrated a lot of players. The Looker does a great job of pointing these questionable decisions out with plenty of humor.

My only minor issues with this game is that it's not really playable without a mouse. You're freehand drawing solutions to maze puzzles and the Steam Deck touchpads and mouse emulation aren't precise enough for some of the later puzzles.

If you haven't played The Witness yet, go watch a summary/lets play on YouTube first (I don't really recommend buying the game, it's way overpriced and very much deserves this parody) and enjoy this free gem.
 
LordErec42

Neongreensniper
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.5 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 3 septembre 2022
Ce jeu, en tant que parodie de The Witness, est extrêmement efficace, moquant la prétention, les réflexions métaphysiques ou encore la lenteur du jeu originel. Vous profiterez d'autant mieux si vous avez déjà fini The Witness auparavant, afin de saisir toutes les références et moqueries que The Looker propose. Entre 1 et 2 heures sont nécessaires pour obtenir tous les succès.
La fin est... comment dire... pleine de sagesse.

3.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 16 aout 2022
Great game, superb ending. Trust me, it's all worth it.
If you're not so good at puzzle games, here's a hint that just explains the mechanics more so than spoil any puzzles: Through the game you draw a red line connecting Start to End. This also works with just the letters S and E though, so keep that in mind.

McStesh
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.8 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 2 aout 2022
Worth every penny, maybe even two or three more.

The only thing funner than playing this game enjoying all the funny commentary and finding all the secrets, is watching twitch streamers who have the attention span of ants try to blast through this game as fast as possible so their 14 year old audience doesn't get bored.

All the while getting aggravated by the audio logs, then accidentally repeating them the first time and getting MORE angry.
Then missing obvious puzzles clues and hints in a parody game made to be intentionally easy.



My only gripe, is that I 100%'d the game, and it refuses to show up as a fully completed game on my list.
If I look at it by itself it's 100%, but if I sort my games by completion it's not present.

Maffew the Burrit-no
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.4 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 31 juillet 2022
Produit reçu gratuitement

The reviews for this game are positive for good reason.

As the trailer suggests, The Looker is a parody of The Witness, but don't let that fool you into thinking this is just some cheap knockoff.

The /ways/ in which it parodies The Witness are extremely well done.
The Looker includes many of the puzzle types and story elements from The Witness, but adds humour into the mix as well.

None of the achievements are obscure and all were within reach, should that matter to you.

Short and to the point, plus it's free:
I highly recommend anyone try this game, even if they've not played The Witness previously.
 
Datael
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
1.6 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 31 juillet 2022
I saw Jacksepticeye's playthrough of this and decided to give it a try myself cause it seemed like a fun and humorous puzzle game (and it is!).
I know this game is a bit of a parody from 'The Witness' but I haven't seen a playthrough of that yet or played it, so I can confirm this game is still just as fun without knowing many of the references!
I 100% recommend giving this game a go! + It's free which is another plus to it!

It features a very intricate and deep subplot and still has me thinking about it hours after I finished the game I cannot believe that masterpiece is a free game. No. Not a game. It would be wrong calling such a wonderful and thought-provoking experience a game. It's much more like an interactive narrative or an experienced metacommentary on life itself. Absolutely wonderful!

(It was genuinely a blast)

Recommandé
2.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 13 juillet 2022
Absolutely flawless game, easily a 10 out of 10, emotional, thrilling, I was glued to the screen. Whilst the game deceptively seems like a comedy, the deep underlying tones of science and religion are unmissable. The game actually takes the player on a thrilling existential adventure, questioning ones very being. The ending is a real tear jerker. Truly beautiful and unexpected, I played this with a friend, we laughed we cried and at the end we were left questioning the very reality we live in. Would play again.
 
Zawodowy Alkoholik
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
2.1 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 12 juillet 2022
It's really, really hard to make a good satire game. You need to actually understand what it is you're satirizing if you want to make meaningful commentary on it; in the case of the Witness, you especially need to understand what people enjoy in the game and what they don't. You need to be able to bring out the elements people like without looking like you're just being a copycat, and you have to bring out the elements people don't like in order to criticize them, but without them bringing down the experience you're trying to create. And on top of all of that, you have to be funny.

All of which is to say, the Looker is a fantastic example of a satirical game. If you have any opinion on The Witness whatsoever, you will be able to find something to love about this game. Even if you've never played The Witness before, you'll probably still get a chuckle here or there, though you might be confused about a lot of the seemingly random details.
 
FENラック1312
683 produits enregistrés
0
2 personnes ont trouvé cette évaluation utile

trox
611 produits enregistrés
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation amusante
0
Recommandé
1.3 h en tout
Évaluation publiée le 11 juillet 2022
The majority of negative reviews are from people who are salty because the puzzles aren't easy. As long as you are the kind of person who takes a step back to test your assumptions and experiment with different ideas or strategies when you get stuck, instead of giving up and aimlessly bashing your head against the wall without thinking, you WILL be able to complete this game.

You also don't need pen and paper, but it really helps, and I highly recommend it. I have taken aroud two pages worth of notes and I still struggled a lot. As with any puzzle game, take breaks and don't play too long on an empty stomach. You can do it! It is only thanks to the great challenge that this game presents that you an achieve such great joy when you finally find a solution to a puzzle, especially if you have been stuck on it for a long time.

And even though I will not spoil the ending, I must warn you that it will make you cry like a baby. It is something truly unexplainable - the feeling, the emotion you experience is so out of your comfort zone, that the only thing left for you is to break down in tears.

also pretty funny
 
Wito
0
1 personne a trouvé cette évaluation utile
0
Recommandé
5.2 h en tout
